102444.name: Big Box Mania
102444.body:
​Oh no, big boxes are dropping from the sky! Push them on the shrink pads to shrink them down to subatomic level before space runs out.

Controls: 
- Use the arrow or WASD keys to move the yellow box (that’s you). 
- **Hold shift to pull instead of push.** 
- You can push and pull multiple boxes in the same row.

Goal:
- Get as many boxes as possible onto the blue tiles before you get hit by a dropping box. 
- The boxes drop at faster intervals as time progresses.

This is my first ever entry into a game jam. I have this thing where I start making games a lot, but never finishing them. I figured the strict deadline would be the motivation I needed. ;)

102463.name: Insufficient Storage
102463.body:
Earth is running out of space. You, a robot, have been sent to Mars (which is teeming with life) to document the plants. However, you have limited data storage, so will have to be careful.

Game Engine:
-Unity

-Programming through Visual Studio

Graphics:
-www.piskelapp.com & Inkscape

Music & Sounds:
-BoscaCeoil

SourceCode found within the .zip.

-Change Log-
-Fixed issue where deposited data would not be removed from the inventory.
-Fixed issue where the new plant image would be hidden behind the mission objective text.
-Removed alien den that had been placed next to the pod for testing (rushed pushing out the game).
-Fixed a certain plant which would not disappear when scanned.

![PageGraphics.png](///raw/e30/91/z/16bad.png)

102472.name: Panda Escape
102472.body:
![Cover.png](///raw/350/d/z/1699f.png)
https://eroz33.itch.io/panda-escape
You play as a poor little panda trapped in a bamboo forest while it's on fire, escape the flames, but you'll need the energy to continue, make sure to eat all the bamboo you can!

Controls
A and D / Left and Right - Movement
W / Up - Jump
You need to eat bamboo in order to jump

Pause behind the bamboo stalks and the panda will begin to munch
The more full you are the faster the panda will move
Can you escape the Forrest before the Fire consumes it all?!

Currently, there seems to be an issue with the windows download. I have added an html5 link hosted on my github. However there seems to be a problem with chrome, firefox, however, works fine!

102476.name: Unbelievable Space Runner
102476.body:
**Unbelievable Space Runner**

![screen_1.png](///raw/7f9/21/z/167a9.png)

![screen_2.png](///raw/7f9/21/z/167aa.png)

![screen_3.png](///raw/7f9/21/z/167ac.png)


_After 42 days of research, Dr. Kumari was able to produce an above average resistance polymer suit in order to fulfill his dream of reach the void._

_In order to achieve his goal, he must run in the space while the suit slowly absorves the purple radiation, which powers the suit and makes he run faster._

_Also, the suit has the ability to absorve the orange radiation, making him able to phase through objects for a short period of time._

_Now, Dr. Kumari is RUNNING OUT OF SPACE_

Game developed for Ludum Dare 42.

**Controls**

Arrows/WASD - Movement

Spacebar/Return - Accept/Activate Phasing

Esc/Backspace - Cancel/Pause

**Change Log**

1.1 - 2018/08/12 21:33 - Tweaked the speed in order to the game start at a faster pace. Also increase the speed gain step and made the shards reward greater.

102501.name: Leaving Room
102501.body:
## Introduction

This is a puzzle game. Control the main character to leave the room.

There are 10+ levels with puzzles, and a simple story about the room and love.

It is a small puzzle game inspired by [Klotski](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Klotski). However, it is totally different from Klotski due to the gravity. Please reconsider your strategy if you ever played Klotski.

## Controls

Use mouse drag & drop to move.

Helper keys:

* Keyboard [R] to restart level;
* Keyboard [P] to go to previous level;
* Keyboard [N] to go to next level ( **CHEATING** do not do this unless you feel the puzzle is really too difficult).

This HTML5 game requires WebGL support. Please play with latest Chrome or Firefox.

![1.png](///raw/460/91/z/163a9.png)

![2.png](///raw/460/91/z/163ab.png)

![3.png](///raw/460/91/z/163ae.png)

102507.name: Put What Where?
102507.body:
Your goal is to receive and sort mixed pallets of different colored boxes to match the outgoing orders.  You have a limited amount of space to organize, and the only way to make more space is to finish the pallet configurations and get them out the door.   The faster you can finish each one the more points you get.  If there is no space to receive the next incoming shipment when it arrives you get a strike - 3 strikes and it's game over.

![ss2.png](///raw/53a/1/z/16164.png)
![ss1.png](///raw/53a/1/z/16162.png)

102531.name: Caving In
102531.body:
You find yourself trapped in a collapsing cave! You are quickly running out of space to breathe, you need to climb quick! Climb as much as you can before the water inevitably floods the whole cave.

**CONTROLS**
 - AD to move left and right
 - SPACE to jump (you can press it twice to double jump)

**TIPS**
 - Use the falling boulders to reach that next platform!
 - Although your goal is to avoid the water, you can also use it to your advantage because of the reduced gravity!
 - There is a *leaderboard*, so compete to be at the very top!

**NOTES**

Unfortunately, I had other responsibilities this weekend so I was unable to put the polish on this game that I was hoping for, and also things like music and audio had to get cut. I still put my best effort forth and got what I could get done given the time I had, so here it is! If there are any fatal bugs that completely prevent you from playing, please let me know! Enjoy, I'm looking forward to all of your guys' feedback.

102544.name: Jet Mail
102544.body:
![unknown (2).png](///raw/4cf/2/z/17091.png)

This game was created with my 10 year old daughter. We came up with the game idea together, I did the programming, and she did all of the artwork.

The concept is a mail delivery guy with a Jetpack, you have a limited number of Spacebar presses to use your jetpack, and you have to refuel otherwise you'll get stranded and have to restart.

Goal: Hit 500 Customer Satisfaction Points to become Employee of the Month.

102553.name: I'm from outer space
102553.body:
I have to stop humans from confining me!
Eat a lot of them, get more DNA, expand and conquer this little blue rock, profit! 👽

You are a little Box, boxxie. You have been abudcted into a scary storehouse. No you have to escape out of the store house by collecting enough money to by your way out.

102570.name: Humanagement
102570.body:
Have you ever thought about beeing downloaded on a virtual world ? Kinda Matrix but it's not hell, it's paradise ... Well, at Humanagement© we got you covered ! Bored of the real world, escape from reality, and let us send you to heaven !

In Humanagement, you're an employee of the biggest company in the world ! You have to send the customers to the cloud as fast as you can, and before the memory of your computer run out of space.

made with game maker.

The Quibbles are fighting about something. Not quite sure what, but they're getting pretty into it.

Take control of a Quibble and knock the goo right out of your opponent. Collect his goo and add it to your own! But watch out, the stage gets smaller as time goes by.

102580.name: Dome Assault

Get Resource Droppers to get cash.  Go collect your cash at the Resource Collector. Viruses eat away at your base. Kill viruses!  Repair blocks by buying new ones at the Block Builder.  Upgrade from Wood to Steel. HORDE INCOMING!

102581.name: Wingman

102592.name: Collapsing Mines of LUMDOOM
102592.body:

Have fun and thanks for playing!

102613.name: Bouncy - A Bouncing Ball Game
102613.body:
The game is simple. You must dodge the enemies that bounce off the walls. There will be more and more and it will get harder. Health power-ups will appear to heal you so make sure to grab them.

You must survive as long as possible to make the highest score possible!

102629.name: DoorsOS - RAM Simulator
102629.body:
![Doors Wallpaper1.png](///raw/48d/11/z/167e7.png)

You are a renomed T.I. professional, and you face off this situation: 
Welcome to a OS that are infested with virus, and its up to you to exterminate it by instaling the best anti-virus in the whole world, The DAIBU Anti-Virus. But keep an eye in the additional tasks that you do NOT WANT to keep, because they consume too much RAM memory.

![Daibuic.png](///raw/48d/11/z/16807.png)

- We use a claustrofobic space and annoying ads to simulate the *running out of space* sensation.
- And of course, the lack of memory RAM that you have
- Use the mouse to play the game
- Runs directly in your browser

**STAFF**

102635.name: Hunting Grounds
102635.body:
​You are a tiger who has to hunt deer to survive. If there are too many deer, then they will eat up all the grass and die out. If there are less than two deer left on the board, they cannot multiply and die out. 

Meanwhile, the village around expands and shifts in territory, causing you and the deer to have less space. 

Game by @r3nrohan (programming) and supriya.

![Capture2JPEG.jpg](///raw/c20/81/z/17f67.jpg)

![Village-ExcessJPEG.jpg](///raw/c20/81/z/17f69.jpg)

Controls

Arrow keys: move and attack (when next to deer)
Z: sleep
Esc: restart

This was our first time participating in Ludum Dare! Please leave us a comment!

102636.name: Clear The Sky
102636.body:
## Clear the sky!
We are running out of space! Build and program rockets to clear the skies before the next season of Game Of Thrones or there is no telling what the unruly citizens will do! Okay, I didn't have time to add any flavor like that, sorry!

![header.PNG](///raw/c5d/8/z/17ab8.png)

### Instructions
Each map has a sender and receiver, you need to connect them with the satellites in a specific order.
Click on a launch pad to select a ship to build, and the program it should use.
- Build rockets
- Choose program
- Config program using drag and drop
- Launch rockets!
- Profit(?)

![ld42b.PNG](///raw/c5d/8/z/17ae7.png)

### Controls
- Mouse is used for most inputs, drag and drop to edit programs
- Space = Launch all rockets
- R = Reload map
- ESC = Quit
- WASD = Camera


![ld42a.PNG](///raw/c5d/8/z/17adf.png)

102639.name: Mismatch
102639.body:
## Description:
 
In this Tetris inspired game you match and mismatch your way to a high score. Progress through increasingly difficult levels and see how far you can get.
 
## Features:
 
* Tutorial!
 
![Tutorial.PNG](///raw/575/z/17a64.png)
 
 
 
 
* Gameplay!
 
![gameplay.PNG](///raw/575/z/17a6d.png)
 
 
 
 
* Win!
 
![level_complete.PNG](///raw/575/z/17a6e.png)
 
 
 
 
* Lose!
 
![lose.PNG](///raw/575/z/17a71.png)
 
 
 
 
* A score that increases!
 
![High_Score.PNG](///raw/575/z/17a77.png)

102645.name: LimitedActions
102645.body:
# LimitedActions 

## Description
LimitedActions is a game where every action you make will have a big impact on the whole level, reducing the space available! So be careful which path you'll go to choose. Most of them are deadly! 

![Screenshot_3.png](///raw/4f0/91/z/17a15.png)

Because of the limited amount of time for the development, the gameplay is not very long and there are some little mistakes in level design and grammar, which I'm very sorry.
**There are 18 levels and an easy BossFight**

![Screenshot_2.png](///raw/4f0/91/z/17a1c.png)

Because of my passion for making strange things in my games. I add a stupid and non-sense story about one of my projects characters. 
The main character of the game is also the narrator/teacher.. in the dialogues you can find a lot of grammar mistakes. 

![Screenshot_4.png](///raw/4f0/91/z/17a29.png)

## Controls

** WASD:  ** - Movements 

** Arrow Keys: ** - Shooting 

** SPACE: ** - SuperPower 

** X: **- Interaction with dialogues 

** Q: **- Close dialogues 

![Screenshot_1.png](///raw/4f0/91/z/17a34.png)

That's everything!! I really enjoyed my first LudumDare, was a fantastic experience. 
I really hope you like the game and also I REALLY HOPE there are not many bugs, haha!

Thanks,
Stroe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uN7jNzI1ry4

102647.name: Running out of the Space-Time Continuum
102647.body:
A space flying experience out of this universe (literally).
![Screenshot (3).png](///raw/463/21/z/17da0.png)

Might not be much but was created while on vacation sailing in Finland with limited network and electricity availability.

![Main Menu.png](///raw/463/21/z/17dd9.png)

**Instructions**
- Try to reach the speed of light
- Don't hit asteroids, it might hurt and they will slow you down
- Profit ?, or maybe death!

![Screenshot (2).png](///raw/463/21/z/17e29.png)

**Controls**
- Up and down arrow keys for movement
- M to mute and unmute the music
- Esc to return to the main menu

102649.name: Small Circuit
102649.body:
Rewire a robot within limited circuit space in order to complete platforming levels.

![Metal2.gif](///raw/8f0/91/z/168cf.gif)

102653.name: Reply All
102653.body:
A management game about keeping your inbox empty, screen clean, RAM empty and wallet full.

You are working in the office. Your duties are to go to meetings, replying to emails, not punching Bob from hitting "Reply All", you know, the usual office stuff. The job is not perfect, but you have to pay the bills, if only your boss would give you a bit more space. Manage your inbox by deleting the mail, you have a limited inbox space, but make sure to read them, you never know if they require a reply. New challenges come up every day, can you manage to finish your 2 day trial and earn enough money to pay rent? 

![REPLY_ALL_THUMB.png](///raw/6b4/3/z/16b60.png)

![REPLY_ALL_SS1.png](///raw/6b4/3/z/16b6b.png)

![REPLY_ALL_SS2.png](///raw/6b4/3/z/16b6d.png)

This was my first ever Jam and I really enjoyed it. A loooooooot if things I wanted the game to do are not in place, but I am sure I will add the post Jam.

P.S. - Anyone looking a source code, I am sorry... The last day was just full on panic... A mess is not a word strong enough to describe it :(

102659.name: Void Knight vs PEST
102659.body:
# Void Knight vs PEST

![monster.png](///raw/650/b/z/17554.png)

## Description

### You have to defend the universe.  
** PEST is getting ready inside his nest to attack **
You are a Void Knight, warriors capable of traveling  ** between dimensions **  
  
You need to kill PEST and his followers ** to defend everyone! **  
Use your Void Spear and your powers! Something evil ** is waiting in the darkness..**  

## MECHANICS 

 Enemy will shoot bubbles. You can pop bubbles until they become too big. 
 After that, ** all you can do is wait. **

 Protect yourself with the Void Spear. Everything will be ** damaged or destroyed **

![screen4.png](///raw/650/b/z/1710c.png)

## >>CONTROLS<<

 - W, A, S, D to move 
 - Mouse to swing your Void Spear 
 - Space + walking to teleport! ( ** if you press space while standing still, it won't work! ** )

## Credits


- @memel06 - Carmelo Ventimiglia! 
  Take a look to my SoundCloud! https://soundcloud.com/user-321527774
  Let's become friend! https://www.facebook.com/melo20miglia
 
## Source 

https://mega.nz/#!rOpUkIqa!_fOk2BmSKruT8FC0jmydFghb96Em7H9kspad04TOISk

** edit ** 

Added Mac build! Is untested, please report if any problems occurs.

102667.name: Moving inc.
102667.body: In this game you need to put objects in truck and score points.![1.png](///raw/a42/21/z/15e23.png)![2.png](///raw/a42/21/z/15e24.png)![3.png](///raw/a42/21/z/15e26.png)

102668.name: Killout
102668.body:
This is a prototype and the level is still under work. You are in an arena which the boundary keeps shrinking, and you have to defeat enough enemies to let the exit appear, before getting injured. Build turrets and dodge enemy attacks to survive the game.
GitHub is super laggy in my area and the game might not be currently shown online.

102670.name: The Long Road
102670.body:
Objective: Get to the destination without as many treasure as possible.

Instructions:
• Left-click on items in the shop to buy them.
• Right-click on items in the wagon to sell them.
• Drag items outside of wagon to discart them.
• Click on items inside the wagon to use/equip them on selected hero.
• Click on enemies to attack them.

102672.name: Running out of Platforms
102672.body:
Requirements:
-Being ambidextrous
-VR Headset
-2 x Keyboards
-Gaming mouse with 30 buttons and 50005 DPI (exactly!)
-Microphone, so you can command your character through Cortana, but only clicking with your tongue in Morse code

Controls:
You can't handle it. Don't even try it.

It's something like the baby of World of Warcraft and Minecraft.

![gameplay1.png](///raw/da2/9/z/18226.png)
![gameplay2.png](///raw/da2/9/z/18229.png)

102677.name: Running Out of Space
102677.body:
Background:

As population grows, the earth is running out of space. Thus your job is to try to find a new home by running out of space! 

Guide:
![GamePlay3.PNG](///raw/4dc/71/z/16153.png)
Player Movement - 'W' 'S' 'A' 'D' or Arrow Keys

Shoot - Mouse Left Click or Press Ctrl Key

Whenever player jumps, it loses its jumping points! When jumping points go to zero, the player will fall and die. Shoot meteor to collect more jumping points!

Goal:

Get a high score!

Collect all 12 types of meteor to unlock something very cool!

102696.name: Shelf
102696.body:
This is My game for Lududum Dare 42 Game Jam. I'm not good in graphic, I will be gald to see Your criticism in comments.
I hope you will find this game interesting.![Скриншот 2018-08-13 21.07.19.png](///raw/321/91/z/17c2e.png)![Скриншот 2018-08-13 21.09.01.png](///raw/321/91/z/17c2f.png)![Скриншот 2018-08-13 21.10.07.png](///raw/321/91/z/17c31.png)

102698.name: There’s No Place Like Home
102698.body:
There’s No Place Like Home is a game about a sad man. Very sad man. And really unlucky one. He fell out of a spaceship and only thing he'll met is Death. But he can choose his own way to die and chooses to die on his home planet – Earth. But it ain't easy task. There're plenty of asteroids that are going to interupt his plans. But with your help he can do that!  
  
Controls:  
W - Thrust up  
S - Thrust down  
Space - Stabilize  
Tab - *magic*  
  
![gifaaa.gif](///raw/ad2/z/16af1.gif)

102702.name: memBrain
102702.body:
Recently, an abandoned bunker was discovered with some nuclear launch codes inside. You should probably get those out of there. 3 of them, at least.

So, people sent in a robot (you) to retrieve the codes. One issue. The robot's memory is a cassette tape. This wouldn't be so bad, if it weren't for the fact that the robot also needs to scan rooms into it's memory in order to see them. Manage your the space in your memory as you try and retrieve the codes, all while your visibility on the facility slowly shrinks.
![capture.PNG](///raw/5d2/71/z/178ff.png)

102724.name: Box overflow
102724.body:
Game where you fill a maze with boxes to go next level. But obstacles will come on your way. Be Clever !

**Warning**: This game requires java to work. A file data will be created in the same folder as the jar to save your configurations and your progress. Don't delete this or you will lose all your configurations and your progression.

102726.name: Mike's Movers
102726.body:
​Everyone hates moving - so hire Mike for you!


Play as poor Mike who has to scuttle around fast and move a bunch of other people's furniture into their houses. Place and rotate different objects in order to beat the clock! But make sure you don't trap yourself in the stranger's house...

PS. - (This is my first ever LD and Compo!)

![mikesscreenshot1.png](///raw/341/91/z/16dc5.png)![mikesscreenshot3.png](///raw/341/91/z/16dc7.png)

102732.name: Running Away
102732.body:
I gotta run away. As far as I can.

![screenshot.PNG](///raw/400/2/z/16660.png)

102735.name: Warehouse Madness
102735.body:
![ld42logo.png](///raw/86d/c/z/17530.png)
Hi, i’m Andrea Di Bartolo, 3d Artist currently working for Shoppe Keep 2, this is my second Ludum Dare when i try, as an artist, to do a game all by myself! (Except for Audio) 
Warehouse Madness is a game where you gotta help Tone the Robot handling the deliver of countless packages, the game has very simple rules: Packages arrive every 4 seconds, you can stack them in the shelves (max 3 packages per tile, be careful to not run out of space!) and deliver in the delivery zone in a specific order (big,medium,small), the starting pile can contain 4 packages maximum, if a package should be delivered and that pile is full, you get a penalty, at 4 penalites you lose!

Controls:

W A S D - Movement

Left Click/E - Pickup package

Right Click/R - Place package

Thanks to Daniel Romeros for the sound effects provided for this game

the music loop is "Time Paranoia" by Roberto Di Bartolo, props to him too for providing me a nice track!

![ld42screen2.png](///raw/86d/c/z/17529.png)
![Ld42cover.png](///raw/86d/c/z/17532.png)

102738.name: Running out of time
102738.body: It's my first LD. I don't know if I'll be able to finish it, but, let's go.

102739.name: Kirsty's Cakes
102739.body:
---------------------------------
In Kirsty's Cakes you need to build an assembly line to make cakes.
Not much of a goal in the game, just reach 30 sold cakes as quick as you can.

102741.name: Package Hell
102741.body:
Try to survive each day by stacking boxes for deliveries, they ar very fragile so don't let them hit the floor... you can throw them though?? 
this is an OCULUS RIFT VR ONLY Experience

Additional people that helped out are included in the credits page.![GameEx3.PNG](///raw/ffa/91/z/17ff0.png)

102748.name: A Few Bits Left
102748.body:
# Play it here:

https://pushxtonotdie.itch.io/a-few-bits-left


## Once Upon A Time....

Two adventurers seek out the RAM stolen from their robot comrade. Wandering outside a temple is the Memory Hog, an evil robot hoarding memory from its brethren. Seek out the Hog, and get back your robot's memory before it runs out of space!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jryIzGTofFo

Created by nookington [twitter](https://twitter.com/gmdvnookington) , [intagram](https://www.instagram.com/thomasnookington/?hl=en)  and pushxtonotdie [website](http://enemyhideout.com).

![title_screen.png](///raw/32a/5/z/178e7.png)

![gameplay_1.png](///raw/32a/5/z/178e3.png)

![gameplay_3.png](///raw/32a/5/z/178eb.png)

## Instructions

You control 3 adventurers. You can click on an adventurer to select it. Click anywhere to move it. With an adventerer selected, you can click on a monster to fight it. Your adventurers will automatically fight baddies nearby. Defeat the big boss to win!

## Stats

Each adventurer and monster has stats such as intelligence, spirit, and power. These stats make them tough against certain opponents and weak against others. Find out which units work best in the current situation!

## Special Moves

Each adventurer has a special move. You can drag from the Special Move area into the playfield to do the move. Special moves have a cooldown, and can only be executed once in a while.


# Play it here: https://pushxtonotdie.itch.io/a-few-bits-left

102752.name: Don't Fall In Love
102752.body:
You are a zombie who's heart already belongs to another - so you must resist falling in love with the endless procession of cute furry animals being sent your way by the wicked witch.

I was only able to jam for part of the weekend, so I am opting out of sound and graphics - I used Kenney assets instead of making everything myself.

**Controls:**
* Movement: Numpad / HJKLYUBN
* Attack: Bump into enemies

**Updates:**

**v1.1 - 2018/08/13 @ 22:53 UTC**

* ​​Added HJKL movement scheme.
* Fixed a bug where the player could start with 2 player characters if they play a second game from the game over screen.

102766.name: POP! Save Person McPersonFace
102766.body:
Oh no! Person McPersonFace has gotten trapped inside a bubble, and if it pops, he dies! Do you have what it takes to save him (or this game's logic) in a timely manner?

In-game instructions can be located from the main menu.![Game1.PNG](///raw/861/91/z/1586d.png)

Tools used:
[Unity3D](unity3d.com)
[Piskel](piskelapp.com)
[GIMP](gimp.org)
[Music Studio 2](xewton.com)
[Audacity](audacityteam.org)

102768.name: Claustrophobia
102768.body:
In this game you play as a patient in what appears to be an insane asylum or laboratory. Your goal is to avoid death and make your way through the tests without being impaled by spikes, burned by lasers, or melted by acid, all the while a wall of spikes will slowly fill in the space of the level behind you. 

Game Design by Benjamin Armour, Chris Molina and Elizabeth Coleman
Level design by Benjamin Armour, Chris Molina and Elizabeth Coleman

Character Animations by Chris Molina
Environment Animations by Elizabeth Coleman and Chris Molina
Art by Chris Molina and Elizabeth Coleman
Programming by Benjamin Armour 
Free Audio assets from Unity asset store.

102773.name: Compactor Clicker
102773.body:
May the force be with you..
Oh! The garbage chute was a really 
wonderful idea. What an incredible 
smell you've discovered! Let's get 
out of here!

A simple clicker game nothing special sorry fellas. And ladies.
Created in under 12 Hours for the Compo.

Programs used to create this monstrosity:

Unity
Blender
Flash
MuseScore
BFXR
Audacity

102778.name: Platform One
102778.body:
The last remaining space station at the end of the universe. Try and house as large of a population as you can while keeping the station in repair and its denizens content lest the consequences of their unruliness start your station on a downward spiral.

This is a deck building game similar to tabletop games like Race for the Galaxy and Terraforming Mars. The player will be faced with a series of events that add and remove cards from their hand. They can play any number of cards to their station but have to choose wisely as space is limited.

102796.name: Dark Colosseum
102796.body:
# Explosive fun in the battle for ascension

You and your fellow demons vie for a spot in heaven. The catch? There's only one spot left.

## Features

- **A Bomberman spin-off** with a twist: each bomb takes away the floor with it. Your world is ever-shrinking!
- **Fast-paced action** and fun for the whole family! (sort of)
- **Gather powerups** to gain an edge over your opponents
- **High replayability** thanks to random arena layouts and short playtime
- **AI opponents** to test your mettle against (no local mp, sorry!)

## How to Play

You always control Player 1 (red).

- WASD or arrow keys for movement
- Space to jump over small gaps
- Left Shift or Left Control to drop a bomb.

Gamepad is also supported!

## Gimme a picture!

![2018-08-13_22-31-31.jpg](///raw/e68/3/z/18070.jpg)

## Want in on the fun?

102799.name: Oniria Times
102799.body:
**-= Welcome to Oniria =-**

You are in charge of the first newspaper of the world of dreams. Choose carefully what news should go to the frontpage, because you are always short of space. Take care of your income and reputation. Be careful with sensationalist news and uncover the secret plots of Oniria.

![RunningOutOfSpace.JPG](///raw/e43/41/z/16505.jpg)More than 5 minutes of play!

You will play 7 key moments in the history of Oniria, and your decisions can change the world.

**Features**

- 50 funny news separated in 7 days
- Secret plots among the news
- 2 alternative endings
- Statistics of your publications
- Jazz music

Learn about Oniria, media, and yourself. Will you discover all hidden plots?

102807.name: Volant Islands
102807.body:
:book: Story-Introduction :book: 
----------------------
Planet Konos is a peaceful place that is known throughout the galaxy for its thriving nature and its magical floating islands. 
These islands are held together by the magic of saplings and the power of ancient wells.
The saplings spend most of their time in those wells and thereby create the flora that fuels the floating islands and holds them together.

Funo, a kind spirit and the protector of Konos, cares for the magic saplings. 
Normally, this just includes things like changing their diapers. But one day the balance of Konos was disturbed
by a passing asteroid named Perseid that radiated black energy. This energy led the floating islands' flora to wilt and the saplings to run away in fear.
Without the magic of the saplings, the floating islands will soon dry out and crumble to the ground. Destroying Konos' delicate ecosystem.

Funo must act quickly, find the saplings and get them back to the ancient wells to rejuvenate the floating islands and save Konos.
Time is of the essence, since the magic islands already begin to crumble.

:camera: Screenshots :camera:
----------------------
![2018-08-13 14_42_54-Window.png](///raw/a98/z/176bd.png)

![2018-08-13 02_20_18-.png](///raw/a98/z/176c3.png)

![2018-08-13 14_47_10-Window.png](///raw/a98/z/17682.png)

![2018-08-13 14_46_33-Window.png](///raw/a98/z/17681.png)

:information_source: About :information_source:
----------------------
This game was made in 48 hours even though we took part in the Jam. 
The color palette used in this game is the original color palette from the legendary Atari2600. Back in the days the Atari had a wonderful color palette as you can see below, however: Because of the hardware-limitations the games used only two to at best ten colors. This game gives a small glimps of how the games back then could have looked like if there would have been no hardware-limitations.
![Atari2600_NTSC_palette.png](///raw/a98/z/1767a.png)

:tools: Tools :tools:
----------------------
* Unity (2018.2.2f1)
  * Intellij Rider
  * TextMesh Pro
* PyxelEdit
* FL Studio
  * MiniBit VST Plug-In

:video_game: Controls :video_game: 
----------------------
W,A,S,D - Move

R - Restart level

Spacebar - Continue after victory

102818.name: Scrapocalypse
102818.body:
Avoid drowning in scrap as you take on the robot apocalypse. Use WASD to move and Shoot with Left Mouse Click!
![Title.png](///raw/e91/91/z/17858.png)![Gameplay.png](///raw/e91/91/z/17859.png)![Gameplay2.png](///raw/e91/91/z/1785b.png)

102827.name: VCR STAR
102827.body:
![screenshot2.png](///raw/152/a/z/163cf.png)

You are home alone and for some reason the tv keeps looping the same program over and over. You aren't sure what happened to cause this but you are bored  of watching​ the same old episode of LionMan. You should take your VHS tape and try making your own scenes using clips from the show! Your VHS tape only has 15 seconds of storage though.. What a Bummer.

## Paste your VHS tape codes in the comments. I'd love to see what you come up with!

If you get stuck or just want to cheat, you can paste these codes into the load video field and it will load in pre-edited VHS tapes for each scene the game wants you to make.


## Cheat Codes

![screenshot3.png](///raw/152/a/z/163d0.png)

## ALT-F4 to quit this one.

102831.name: Concentrate
102831.body:
​Do you remember Concentration,

"No repeats or hesitation"?

Well this is that but musically

So don't repeat that melody!



Press keys on the beat to play a melody. However, the track repeats every eight notes. Avoid repeating the same pitch on the same beat to score points!

Due to scheduling conflicts, this game is in pretty rough shape. It's more of a proof-of-concept than a finished game.


## CONTROLS:

Z, X, C, V, B, N, M, and Comma keys: play notes

Space: Start and restart the game

Escape: Quit the game

## RESOURCES USED:

​FL Studio 12

Unity 2017.2

GIMP and Paint

Blender

102840.name: The Alphanumorph
102840.body:
A gigantic alien is filling up your entire spaceship and trying to eat you!

Run for your life in this game, challenged by the Alphanumorph, spike traps, and experimental movement controls!
.


![juego pantalla.jpg](///raw/863/7/z/174c7.jpg)


.
You move by pressing the numbers in the upper section of your keyboard.

Press the keys next to the number in the grid you're standing on to move left or right.

Press the key that matches the number you're standing on to fly. You can move while flying!

.

The game is easy to learn, but hard to master!

Challenge yourselves with these 3 levels and escape!

.

Made in 48hs for the Ludum Dare 42 "Running out of Space"

Martin Isla

Macarena Haspert 

Franco Chioraia

Katerine Olmazabal

Matias Paredes

Lorenzo Gutierrez

.

Thank you for playing :)

We hope you like it

Feedback is appreciated!

.

Rookbird Games

102841.name: Tunnel Run
102841.body: Drag your character to victory in this fun and addicting game where you avoid the black abyss closing in on you. Can you survive the darkness? Made for ludum dare 42: Running out of Space

102853.name: The Mail Room
102853.body:
Sort as many boxes as you can.

Trigger warning: Depressive themes

Controls:
Movement - WASD
Sprint - LShift
Interaction - Left Mouse
Unlock Cursor - ESC

102856.name: Running out of space
102856.body:
Controls:

* W, A, S, D  -- Movement
* Space -- Pickup / Drop a package

Instructions are in game!

---------------------------

You are a lonely border security officer stationed at an airport dealing with all the incoming packages.

Scan the packages, check for bombs, and deliver them to waiting customers.

Its harder than it sounds, and SUPER rewarding.

Share your scores in comments!

![Cover_640x512.png](///raw/13/z/15d78.png)

![Image 2018-08-13 at 12.41.44 AM.png](///raw/13/z/15fd2.png)

good luck runner

102859.name: Population Crisis
102859.body:
It's the year 2200. The Earth has no more room for its population. Experts predict that if the population reaches 1.5 Trillion civilization will collapse. Your objective is to send people into space on colony ships. Your mission will be considered a success if the Earth's population falls below 500 billion.
Assets:
Laborers build ships. The more of these you have the faster your ships will be built.
Researchers provide research points to unlock larger ships or to upgrade your workers, ships, and buildings.
Family Planning Centers slightly reduce the population growth rate.
Donation Centers increase the amount of money you earn.
Research:
Manufacturing increases the speed your laborers work.
Cryogenics increases the amount of people a ship can hold.
Birth Control increases the effectiveness of Family Planning Centers.
Campaigning increases the effectiveness of Donation Centers.

Good Luck! The world is counting on you.

102903.name: Uroboros Initiative
102903.body:
![18-08-13-32.png](///raw/db7/21/z/16e32.png)
You are a researcher at a mysterious laboratory experimenting with space stuff, and just like last week some intern left the experimental space disintegrator on overnight and you have to clean the mess up!

102907.name: Secret Knight
102907.body:
Help the King control his rapidly growing kingdom in Secret Knight, my first Ludem Dare game.

![background.PNG](///raw/af1/91/z/1609a.png)

The King demands that you, Secret Knight, must silently assassinate his people so they do not overthrow him. However, try to do it in secret! If there are at least 10 witnesses, the King will execute you! The King will also execute you if you slaughter too many Villagers, or if you let too many live...

![Screenshot 2018-08-13 02.41.04.png](///raw/af1/91/z/160ae.png)

The Basic Controls are: "wasd" to move your character, "space" to make your character jump, "left shift" to make your character run, "e" to build a wall in front of you, "mouseclick" to make your character attack, and "escape" to bring up the menu. 

![builadd.png](///raw/af1/91/z/160e1.png)
The UI shows how many Villagers are Witnesses, the town's population, the King's minimum population requirement, the King's maximum population limit, whether your build is on cooldown, and your killcount. 

Secret Knight is best played without knowing too much about it, so the rest is up to you to discover! How large will your town grow in population, and will you run out of space?

![large town.png](///raw/af1/91/z/160ea.png)

My record for final kill count is 145! Why not share yours in the comments?

![highscore.png](///raw/af1/91/z/1752d.png)

Tips for those who struggle: (!!! DON'T READ IF YOU LIKE DISCOVERING GAME MECHANICS YOURSELF !!!)

You can destroy village houses too! Just hit them 3 times. This will help slow down the population growth. 

Villagers can't become witnesses if they can't see you... Build walls with "e" to kill undetected!

102913.name: Board 'n' pieces
102913.body:
![DyingBoard2.gif](///raw/b42/3/z/16354.gif)






**== Full screen recommended==**


A tactical (board?) game for 2 players playing on the same machine. *(Shh it's a lot easier to play if you have 2 mouses)*

This is my first Compo submission! Yay!

I really hate how bad I am at chess. The pieces keep jumping around through impossible spaces, and my king got mated inside a castle!?

So here's a totally non-chess-like game, where your surrounding allies can support you, and pieces can't cross the whole board in a single turn.

And you know what, let's forget the king. It's 2018, everyone's equal! (I mean the game mode is Last Man Standing)

**Post-Compo Update:**
- Bugfix: forcefully resolve endless battles.
- Added stupid AI so people playing alone can test the game.


**Controls:** Mouse only unfortunately.

**Tools:**
- Engine: Unity
- Sound: Audacity, Garage Band, Bfxr
- Images: Aseprite


**Source Code Note:**

The source included doesn't run as it is. Unfortunately some of the code libraries I used are paid assets (most notably Entitas) and thus I can't include them for public sharing.


## Don't read the part below if you haven't played the game

..

..

..

**Possible variations I thought of**
(Do tell me if you think one of them is a good idea)
- Bring the "king" back: each player secretly assign a squad as their "king" units. When that unit die, they lose.
- Bring the king back 2: no secret, but the leader squad get a buff (x2 strength maybe?)
- Stop the snowball: each time a squad is defeated, its controlling player get a skull mark to use (mark a tile to destroy)
- Custom team (choose your loadout/formation)

102937.name: LD42 - 42 Pillars of Stone
102937.body:
Wowsers, first Game Jam and got something done!
![PillarsOfStoneMenu.PNG](///raw/812/91/z/16ab6.png)


Controls:
- Mouse-Look
- WASD to move
- Left click to fire

You are a bad ass fire mage, to complete your training you are sent to the dimension of fire and stone.
Your only weapon is your fireball, and all corpses turn to stone blocking your way and the orcs.

Run around and avoid the Orcs, gain levels and try to finish it!
Not that hard if you get a few good levels.

Sound toggle / slider doesn't work.

Wanted to get so much more in there and iron it out, just didn't have the time!
Was amazing to take part, and will definitely be in the next one!

Probably buggy as all hell, but need to get to work, going to book next one off.

Let me know what you think and good luck.

102938.body:

#### Dystopia Tycoon
The cities of the world are overpopulated and you are going to fix that! You will turn a little piece of land into the homes of hundreds of people. You will have to plan ahead to ensure that your settlement can thrive within its borders. Best of luck and don't forget to have fun!

#### Dystopia Tycoon features:
- Isometric pixel-art graphics
- Quick strategic gameplay
- Ability to run out of space

#### Download now!

102961.name: I'm TOTALLY not a clicker!
102961.body:
![gameplay.gif](///raw/e4/z/17bdf.gif)

This game was created in 48 hours as a Ludum Dare 42 entry. I named this game in honor of my colleague Robert who totally dispises clickers. With this title however, I'm sure he'll play it anyway. 

## Instructions
You only need a mouse to play this game!

### Basics:
Drag cubes over similar ones:
- Two level 1 cubes make one level two cube
- Two level 2 cubes make one level three cube
- Two level 15 cubes make one level 16 cube
- ???? level 1 cubes make one final cube

### Coinz:
Cubes earn you gold
Better cubes earn more
Buy cubes for gold

### Theme:
Yeah, I decided to forego adhering to the theme this time and just make a game I felt like making.

## Bug FIxes:
August 13, 2018 @ 5:30 CET: fixed a bug where you could drag a cube through the floor rendering it lost. This can be pretty frustrating.

Excuse me for the poor design of the UI (I rushed it last minute) and the quality of the assets :/

Pliz be constructive in your comment as I am new in game Dev

Thx have fun =D

102991.name: 2954: Robot Puzzler
102991.body:
![cover.png](///raw/7bd/c/z/161ea.png)

Guide your intrepid robot `Unit::2954` to the exit of each level in this robotic puzzler!

You have very limited harddrive space, and so have to rely on picking up and ejecting diskettes found littered around the map. Available on itch.io for Mac and Linux. Also available on the web!

I wrote a blog post about it [here](http://sewerbird.github.io/content/blog/coding/Ludum-Dare-42)

## Features

This COMPO submission features

* 5 Levels
* Puzzle Tips from sysadmin AKU
* Full UI
* All Assets & Music made by myself in 48 hours. (Credit to Bosca.ceol and BFXR for saving my bacon here)

## Plans

Post-COMPO, there will be a JAM mode with

* Extra Levels
* Better music
* More Diskettes
* Animations

Vampyre is a shoot-em up game where your goal is to vanquish vampires. Kill vampires and throw them on the pyre to fuel the fire! What high-score will you obtain?

103044.name: PushtA
103044.body:
Pushta

RUNNING OUT OF SPACE on your nice square board. So what to do?

STACK the colors!

Due to some technical problems with you "grey board 3000" you can only move one color at a time with the CURSOR / ARROW keys!
The currently active color is marked in the top left corner.
Stacking more that one block at a time gives you extra points.
Blocks do ONLY STACK when TOUCHING THE WALL!

Try to stack all the boxes with as FEW moves as possible while getting as MANY POINTS as possible.

TL;DR:
Use cursor keys
Move boxes with the color marked in the top left corner
Stack them when they touch the wall and push into each other
Make points (more when stacking > 1 box per move)

Have fun!

p.s.: tired, late, no time for love dr. jones, more info tomorrow!


![pushta-1.PNG](///raw/c56/z/170b3.png)

103065.name: Trash Tide
103065.body:
# Trash Tide #
## About the Game ##
Trash Tide is a game where you around a beach picking up as much trash as possible whilst the tide is rising washing away the trash. Any trash that ends up in the ocean decreases the public's opinion of the beach! Alongside you is a variety of power ups to assist you in your beach cleanup operations!

## Controls ##
**WASD / Arrow Keys** - Movement

**Spacebar** - Jump / Swim Up

**Left Click** - Collect Trash / Power Up

**Right Click** - Use Power Up

## Media ##

103068.name: Warehouse Simulator 2018
103068.body:
Welcome to a game where you chuck boxes around a warehouse! If you love the gravity gun from half life, but have always wondered what it would be like in a warehouse management scenario... then this is that?? Try not to run out of space in the warehouse!

Ran out of time a bit towards the end, so there's a few things that need a little more work to improve, and a few things that I just didn't have time to put in. Will definitely be continuing to work on it post jam, so any feedback would be amazing.

Looking forward to a rest tomorrow, and playing everyones games!

our hero swims through the dangers to his ***destination***, good old ***Earth*** :earth_africa:, his only hope for survival.

So what are you waiting for? Download :arrow_double_down: the game and let's get started!

103089.name: Garbage Collector
103089.body:
## The goal
The goal of the game is to put burnable items in the burner and plastic on the recycle conveyor belt! 

## How to beat the game
You'll win when all the trash has been handled, but you'll fail if you run out of space. New trash will fall down and the amount of trash will increase every time. 

## What you shouldn't do :)
If you burn plastic or try to recycle a pot you'll get punished with extra trash in next round!

Uploading what I got because I may not have a chance to do more tomorrow!

Move with WASD, jump with SPACE and run with SHIFT.  Use LMB to activate Slow Motion.


ESC closes the game and R restarts it if you got stuck or want to try again.

The Sealevel is rising fast, but don't worry comrade! The Party has devised a fool-proof way of building makeshifts islands in a hurry. Just try not to get crushed ( or drown).

Warning: Could be a bit loud.

103116.name: Panic Dungeon !!
103116.body:
![Background_3.png](///raw/53b/z/17025.png)
![Page_explanation.png](///raw/53b/z/16598.png) 



## CONTROLS:

103124.name: Eject Tape
103124.body:
Eject Tape is a videotape-themed maze wanderer starring a little crt-robot with not enough space in his memory. He writes his life to tape and lets it go. 

Now, our robot is wandering through his old memories, looking for things that were lost long ago. He can play one tape at a time, and each tape recalls a different maze of lost thoughts. To become whole again, he must find his way through each maze and recover what he lost.


My submission for Ludum Dare 42. The theme was running out of space.

Made with Godot 3. Graphics are from Krita, music is from Caustic 3, and sound effects are from my microwave.


This is my first time participating in a game jam. I had a blast and learned a lot!

![screen_3.png](///raw/4c2/91/z/1628a.png)

103125.name: A blob with a destination - LD42
103125.body:
I took the platformer approach for my first ever Ludum Dare. I've been playing around with game design on and off between schoolwork, but never really had the time to commit to a project. The goal was to make a super fast paced platformer, I managed to finish 12 levels. Everything in the game is made during the 48 hours of the game jam, no extra assets were imported or used.

The goal is simple, jump towards the portal.

You control the character with the mouse, clicking jumps towards the mouse, right clicking uses a power (there are two of them) and consumes it. Can you reach the portal before the lava catches up? Watch out for the fire beams and cutting wheels along the way! And when you finally feel like you've avoided it all, gravity changes!

![ezgif.com-video-to-gif (2).gif](///raw/bc2/91/z/16641.gif)

**Controls:**

Left mouse: Jump

Right mouse: Use Power

Left/Right arrow key or A/D: Move while not jumping

R: Restart level


**Tools used:**

Audacity to record sound

Busca ceoil to create the sound track

Unity3D to creat the game

Asesprite to create the artwork

Paint.net to do some things Asesprite lacks

103132.name: Save the Galaxy
103132.body:
NOTE: This game was made in 48 hours by Kostyantyn Milkevych for Ludum Dare 42 Compo.

Save the Galaxy, and don't run out of space.

The Story:
Humanity discovered how to convert space into a lot of energy.
Now everything runs on space, including your hp-shield and gun.

Humanity lives happy, but some evil people have built an evil machine
to do their evil plan: to convert our galaxy to energy and kill us all.

You must prevent that outcome, by infiltrating their different bases.

Controls:
You move and jump with ARROW KEYS or WASD.
Shoot with SPACE and reload with R.
In the “story” menus between/before levels, you can
only use LMB (left mouse button) to continue.

Game Tips:
Don't forget to reload when necessary.
You can see how many bullets you have left, in the bottom right corner.

Health and Space pickups can be timed for better effectivity.

The more you destroy on each level, the better score you will get.

There's permadeath, so watch out!
![demo4.PNG](///raw/ad2/91/z/16276.png)
![demo2.png](///raw/ad2/91/z/1627d.png)
![demo5.png](///raw/ad2/91/z/1627e.png)

To download the source code, follow the link to itch.io, the source files are aviable for download on that page.

103133.name: Shrinkle
103133.body:
Have fun trying to survive in this small and quick game!
It can be difficult too!

103148.name: Fuoco and Tenebra
103148.body:
Our first Ludum Dare!

Play to **survive the night**. Avoid the dark by lighting fires and tending to the ones already lit. But take care, there are creatures out there that prefer your lights extinguished.

**Features an original soundtrack**


![Opening.png](///raw/476/11/z/170cf.png)


![enemy.png](///raw/476/11/z/170cd.png)

meta.link-01-name: The 2 files need to be in the same folder (FHD res suggested)

103161.name: Burnout
103161.body: This is our first jam game, and also our first published game in general! In this game you avoid walls while making it back home from work. It takes only a couple of minutes to complete. Have fun! [Burnout_1.png](///raw/096/41/z/17a16.png)

103168.name: Don't give up, Earth!
103168.body:
The universe is shrinking and the planets are running out of space to be in. So what happens next? A battle between the planets, of course!

Smash into the other planets and collect powerups to increase your survival chance! Destroying other planets gives you more time until your imminent death.

103170.name: Llama Hotel
103170.body:
Llama Hotel is A game where you try to catch as many llama's as you can.
Move with wasd or arrow keys.![sode.jpg](///raw/49f/11/z/16137.jpg)

103177.name: Foto 5
103177.body:
Please use **CHROME** to play. 
Not working in other browsers sorry :/

Tools used:
- Code: HTML5/Javascript
- Framework: Phaser3
- Art: ClipStudioPaint and Inkscape
- Audio: Audacity 
- IDE: IntelliJ

![screenshot2.png](///raw/924/a/z/15eea.png)

103183.name: Urban Planning
103183.body:
In **Urban Planner** you play as a tiny dude who has to build a lot of houses. 

Unfortunately the area is full of **blob monsters**. 

Kill them all with houses to proceed to the next area!

Don't use all the space you have though. If you put too many houses in an area, you'll **RUN OUT OF SPACE**.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-o_-JJKV8XE

**Controls :** 

Keyboard/Mouse : wasd or arrows to move, space to dodge, left click to build houses

Gamepad : Left stick to move, right stick to shoot, A to dodge

![Screenshot_3.png](///raw/1e0/1/z/16f07.png)

**Credits  :**

All code, design, 3D modeling, UI stuff, music, sound effects by Renaud Forestié

Game created for #LDJAM42 in 47 hours and 50 minutes.

**Tools used :**

Unity, Blender, Oculus Medium, Photoshop, After Effects, Github, Garage Band, 3D Coat, Spotify

![Screenshot_5.png](///raw/1e0/1/z/16f0d.png)

![Screenshot_4.png](///raw/1e0/1/z/16f16.png)

![Screenshot_6.png](///raw/1e0/1/z/16f0e.png)

103184.name: Leiden's Quest
103184.body:
You are running out of space in your inventory. Select the best items to kill as many monsters as you can and to go deeper in the dungeon !

The only thing you can do to kill more monsters is to find the best items and to get rid of some of them if you haven't enough space.

103189.name: Ludum Dare 42
103189.body:
![gjbanner.png](///raw/1e2/91/z/17d06.png)
Ink Flood is a puzzle platformer game in which you must escape from a building that is filling up with ink.

Jump, climb, stomp, collect keys, and travel through seven stages to complete the game :smile: 

Created for the Ludum Dare #42 game jam -

103213.name: A tiny corner
103213.body: In a world where the ground and the ceiling are... unstable, you have to help a little square in order to protect him.

103215.name: Get Off My Boat, You!
103215.body:
EDIT: Now you can play and ride over poor swimmers in the browser!

Hello Fellow Gamers!
About the game:
The idea of the game resolves around not letting swimmers get into your boat. It is your property and what is worse, it cannot fit many people…

You are the Captain now!
Steer your boat and do maneuvering tricks... or go straight ahead!
![no2.png](///raw/e23/91/z/16e61.png)
Remember. Try to keep away from those pathetic swimmers. All they want is to get inside yar boat. But their pathetic bodies weight and you cannot travel with many of them bastards!
![no3.png](///raw/e23/91/z/16e67.png)
Enough about the game, let's talk what will happen with this game.
I wish to improve the AI of the swimmers as well as add more dynamic point counting system. Some achievements and challanges will come in handy too. Eventually, it should appear on the Android Market (eee I meant Google Play) and/or App Store. So look out, mates!

Tools used:

GameCreator: Unity

Programming: Microsoft Visual Studio & JetBrains Rider (the licence wend off in the middle of the weekend haha)

Graphics: Photoshop

Music: voice recorder and my mouth (the motor as well haha)

This is very first ever submission for Ludum Dare.
I am Eric (21 lvl), Polish programmer from passion. On the daily basis I am a sailor (Junior Deck Officer on a merchant navy ship) and a scientist of ocean engineering. Funny coz the hydrodynamical model (though very simplified for this game purpose) used in the game is based on my research work I am doing currently. 
Here is a sample of my work: http://repository.am.szczecin.pl/handle/123456789/2472 (total bore warning though) :D
Hope you will enjoy it!
Cheers,
Eric

103230.name: Squeezed Out
103230.body:
Just Squeeze! Feel the pressure!

![intro.png](///raw/ce9/81/z/16d68.png)

CONTROLS

Enter Key - Start Playing

Space Bar - Squeeze

103246.name: Bunny Flood
103246.body:
You have angered the Great Lunar Rabbit, and now they have decided to curse you with a great flood! Quickly, you must build your town up to the moon so that you might plead your case to the god before your people are wiped out!

Bunny Flood is a time-trial tycoon where the player must accumulate resources and build buildings in order to ascend faster than the oncoming flood, but be warned, costs rise as you build higher and higher!


A game made by Team Brun:
-Julien Fontaine
-Justin Loranger-Ahluwalia
-Xavier Nolet
-Caroline Prenoveau

103247.name: Notebook Boy in The Ghostbook
103247.body:
You have made a nice little home on this page in the notebook. It seems as though someone might be writing a little love story, with ghosts! Quickly run around and erase his notes and doodles to reclaim the page as your own!
![Screen Shot 2018-08-13 at 1.36.42 PM.png](///raw/022/21/z/17ac0.png)

103258.name: U Kill U Fall
103258.body: A small arcade game. you are stuck inside a volcano and the way down leads to hell!, if you want to survive you will have to defeat the creatures hell sends. but every time a creature dies, the platform you are walking on shrinks! but luckily if you kill more then one enemy the platform wont shrink and may grow! use that to your advantage, for more info read the credits in the game.

103268.name: Chef Frank's Franks
103268.body:
Help Chef Frank make franks for his hungry customers before his shift ends.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 42 with the theme running out of space/

Chef Frank does not have enough counter space to fit all of his appliances and must constantly toss things into his trailer when not in use.  

Controls:

Arrow Keys:  Move Frank around.

Space Bar:  Pick up food, put food in appliance, get food from appliance.

Z:  Pick up any appliance you may want to throw into the trailer.

X:  Throw away any food being held.

Number keys 1-3: Turn in the held frank to the corresponding customer.

![franksfranksgameplay.PNG](///raw/66c/21/z/16155.png)

103277.name: Closing in on Pascal
103277.body:
Pascal the raiding racoon has taken something from a temple, and now the walls are closing in on him. Help Pascal escape the rooms before he is crushed, or killed by the obstacles that are in his way.

![LD42-00007.gif](///raw/c4a/z/17065.gif)

Written in a custom C++ engine using SFML 2.5.0.

Run - A & D - Left Stick    
Jump - Space - A
Switch -Return - B
Enter Next Level - Up - Left Stick (Up)
Jump Down - Down + Space - Down + A    

How to Play: Find the exit as fast as you can before the walls close in on you. Make sure to press Up to enter the exit.
A few levels will require a key to open the exit. If you see a switch, you can flip it with the Switch button
to expand the walls for extra time.

103303.name: A Way Out
103303.body:
In This Game You will be able to play as a cannon. Your Goal is to survive.  You will need to shoot the moving wall in order to stay way! you can recharge your bullets by catching the blue balls.

I am 17 and this is my first game published! I love making games! and i hope that Ludum Dare stays the same so that i can do another game in the next year!![Untitled-1.png](///raw/383/91/z/16157.png)

103313.name: The Angry Talking Goblin
103313.body:
Play Fullscreen!

Play and become better by upgrading items, but watch out so they don't fall down! Also please be patience with Mr Goblin... He can be difficult sometimes.

Press Space! Collect Items, put them on! Collect coins!

Might be slow the first minute of gameplay, but will quickly become a bloody item fest!


There is a visualbug where the floor dissapears in the middle, just  a visual!

Also Damage numbers might be a bit off, cause when unity build is diffrent from editor, and I might have overbuffed it after I though it was to slow.!

103315.name: Clean-Up Crunch
103315.body:
After promising his friends to house-sit, Clive decides their house is the perfect place to throw a party. Awaking from the heavy night of drinking, he comes to the horrifying discovery that his friends will be getting back today... in 5 minutes.

Test your organizational skills in this hectic storage game, trying to shove as much of the evidence from the party under beds and into cupboards within the time limit.

103316.name: House of Dog
103316.body:
![HouseOfDogs.png](///raw/9b6/81/z/16b76.png)
Do you have what it takes to build your towering doghouse faster than the rising tide of canines, or will you drown in the sea of good doggies?

103320.name: Zero Star
103320.body:
Shoot, Dodge and Win!

A star has just exploded and you have to get out of it's range! You are blocked by the Mother Ship of Invaders! You must shoot, dodge and try to not run out of space between the star explosion and the Invaders! (How many times have I said "Shoot, Dodge and Win"?)

Controls:

- W, Up Arrow = Up

- S , Down Arrow= Down

- D,  Right Arrow = Right

- A, Left Arrow = Left

- Space = Shoot

103321.name: Space Crusher
103321.body:
[Skärmavbild 2018-08-13 kl. 00.49.36.png](///raw/cc2/c/z/16e29.png)
​Find 4 keys in order to stop 4 walls that is about to crush you!
Unfortunately you can only carry one at a time, so hurry up scattering through the maze.
Drop them off in the middle in order to stop the walls, before you run out of space!

Controls:
WASD/ARROWS to move
ESCAPE to return to menu
SPACE restart/next level

This game was made in under 48 hours in Ludum Dare 42.
Created by Brallex!

103322.name: Hunted Cat
103322.body:
You're a hunted cat! And with your new non-physical form, you can't stay outside soild objects for too long, So you are literally running away from Space.. And into objects!

The first and probably the worst participation ever for a Ludum Dare xD
Well... we created something, and the 3D graphics made it hard to deal with.
However, we did learn a lot from this process.. and we know that we could have made something better 
(or at least complete)

We used:
-Unity Engine
-Blender
-Valve Hammer Editor
-Textures form the internet.

103333.name: [REDUCE:REUSE]
103333.body:
## Description

[REDUCE:REUSE] puts you in control of a trash sorting drone, being evaluated on your ability to sort ever-growing piles of waste. Do your best to pick up and sort plastic, glass and metal against the clock!

## Controls

WSAD/Arrows to move, Space bar picks up/drops off waste. Waste storage is first-in, last-out, so your most recent pick-up will be your next drop off.

## Goals

I missed the last few dares due to life events, and I Wanted to get back into things with something simple. I also wanted to experiment with 3D/perspective and improve my animation skills.

## Issues

Relies on key events in JS, so multi-key input tends to stick and cause movement to stop completely.
Untested in Firefox / Safari, Chrome recommended.
Spawner isn't intelligent, and can box in a facility or the player, making it completely impossible to continue.

## Tools

Game written entirely in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. 
Graphic work was done in Photoshop and processed through CodeKit 3.

## Screenshot
![Untitled-10.png](///raw/f99/2/z/16cc1.png)

103335.name: The Island Of Decay
103335.body:
In The Island Of Decay you will have to escape from an island that is collapsing into an acid sea and also you will have to survive against an active volcano!


Tutorial: first of all you have to find 1 stick and 2 stones; then you have to make an axe and chop down 12 trees! Then you make a raft and you make 2 oars head and then you craft 2 oars! To build the raft you have to enter and exit several times carrying some logs and the raft will start building! Then once you made the raft you wait the acid water and when it's close enough you will start rowing to the safety!


Note: this is a solo made game. If you want to collaborate with me in this or other project don't esisate to contact me on Discord (Penca53#1165) or in my email (pencapencator@gmail.com).

103343.name: Shopping Simulator 2018 Mega-Deluxe Edition
103343.body:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/MrSerp_)

**Description**

By some stroke of luck, you have been afforded the shopping spree of a lifetime, at none other than the illustrious Sale-Mart! Sale-Mart, where the deals are great, the products are large, and you'll be running out of space in your wallet with all the savings! The only catch is: you only keep everything if you complete your shopping list, anything you scan past that is extra savings!

Sale-Mart has also been so gracious as to leave you a top of the line, vintage (and slightly rickety) cart to haul around your savings! There may not be much room in it, but nobody said you couldn't make multiple trips!

**Disclaimer**

Current build has a hard coded 5 minute timer and gives you a random shopping list to complete. Scan objects at self-checkout in order to remove the item from your shopping list.

Controls can be found on the wall when you first spawn.

See if you can actually complete the round! If you can, leave a comment!

**Special Thanks and Credits**

- Quill18 and Tim Ruswick for providing entertainment on Twitch while slogging through development

- [Bit Orchestra](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfvVKAi3oNbXUPe_KUTRX8Q) for the royalty free store music

- My original team, who I had to abandon due to an early unexpected medical emergency

**Screenshots**

Suffice it to say, I had a *bit* of a tantrum at 2am as code remained glitchy!
![cleanup-needed.png](///raw/a1a/9/z/17744.png)

Arby's ain't got nothing on Sale-Mart's choice cuts!
![we have the meat.png](///raw/a1a/9/z/17746.png)

I will nurture the eggplant, raise it... until it can wield the power of *all* of the infinity stones!
![giant eggplant.png](///raw/a1a/9/z/17749.png)

103346.name: SkyCrates
103346.body:
A reflex game... to collect all that sweet free stuff that falls in your backyard every day!
Good luck yo!
Try it!


Made by Swamp on Youtube!
## Tools Used
Multimedia Fusion 2 Developer
Adobe Photoshop CS6
Paint.net

103350.name: The Eternal Fight (for space in bed)
103350.body:
# A king size bed is not large enough for two people!
## A fighting game with a combo system based on a couple fighting for space in the bed.
### Based on a true story

Push your partner (the AI) out of bed. Create combos by chaining moves. Different moves have different effects, so experiment!

Failing a combo makes you fall asleep for a while (it's late, after all), so be careful!

Currently only single player!

![ld42screen2.PNG](///raw/4b3/91/z/16428.png)

Created using Javascript, Html, CSS, Python, Krita, Photoshop, Acid Pro 8.

103353.name: Parking Ships
103353.body:
The goal is park how much ship as you can inside the limited space hangar. If you manage to get all the ships inside the time it took will be saved and you will be able to try again to beat that time.

Controls:

-Click a ship to control it.
 
-Arrows keys for go forward/backwards and rotate.

-Q and E for rotate.

// Sorry for the scuffed english , I'm still learning it!

Tools:

Engine: Unity

Art: Asesprite

Sounds: Bfxr

Programming language: c#

Changelog:

-Fixed problem where you couldnt click new ships (I think)

-Fixed infinite rotation on not controlled ships

[parkingShipsGameplay.png](///raw/b9c/61/z/168d2.png)

103356.name: Running In To Space
103356.body:
![rits.png](///raw/d1b/21/z/1668d.png)

You are an astronaut trapped on a remote planet, and need to run your way into orbit!  Basically an infinite-runner with obstacles you need to jump over.  The timing gets harder the faster you go, naturally.

Not actually quite done, but close!  There's no win condition detection, and there were supposed to be more levels and different hazards and such.  It's proooooobably winnable.

Written in Rust using [ggez](http://ggez.rs/).

Install instructions: Just download the zip file for your platform and run the exe!  On Linux you might have to install SDL2 for your platform, and maybe also `libasound2`... and other random junk.

Build instructions: See Github readme page.

Also shout out to EatThePath who kept me a little saner than I would otherwise be during this compo.  Check out [his game!](https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/made-with-meat)

103362.name: Arnold, the dazed Grasshopper
103362.body:
Meet Arnold, your usual Grasshopper. Well, not so usual. He has a rare genetic dysfunction and needs special medication to be able to see clearly. His medication? Magic Mushrooms! 
Help Arnold find his home by collecting Shrooms and exploring levels. And watch out for cacti(cactuses). They are hiding everywhere and not very healthy for Arnold to step on.

We implemented the theme "Running out of space" by narrowing down Arnold's vision over time, thus he is running out of space. 
Leave a comment down below and link your games so we can try them out!  Thank you so much for playing!

Made by: 
Tomi G.
Urška Š.

Enjoy!

Screenshots
![Screenshot_3.png](///raw/bcb/d/z/17f0e.png)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
![Screenshot_1.png](///raw/bcb/d/z/17efc.png)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Screenshot_2.png](///raw/bcb/d/z/17f07.png)

meta.link-02-name: Download it for Windows, MAc & Linux Standalone

103363.name: TrashyGame
103363.body: It is a game about trash.

103377.name: LD42: Past the Edge of Space
103377.body: Thi is my first Ludum Dare entry, where you play as an alien in the future! No spoilers though!

103385.name: RainForest
103385.body:
![Rainforest_Logo 1.png](///raw/cf1/91/z/17bf9.png)

Mouse & Keyboard Controls Only         
-Mouse: click to drag boxes to Department Slots
     
-Space: to continue during dialogue

-Escape : to get options menu

Rainforest is a mail room style, matching game. Join Rainforest Inc as an employee and try to last as many days as you can wihthout getting fired, the job is tedious but that's your life as a 9 to 5 Rainforest Employee! The trick is to Match the boxes with it's appropriate Department in order to keep the machines Capacity Space from reaching maximum. Once the Machines Capacity is at it's max the machine will overheat and you will get fired! 


![RainforestGIF.gif](///raw/cf1/91/z/17c9f.gif)

Guide: 

-Capacity increases each second *Getting multiple matches in a row Decreases Capacity Faster

-Dropping or Errors Resets your Combos to 0

-3 Errors on the top ( X ) and you will get Fired!

-Days last 45 seconds , Each day gets harder! 

-All Boxes and slots randomize their order.

-Dropping mail outside of slots will increase Capacity each time.

103405.name: Don't stop running!
103405.body:
You've just escaped from an intergalactic prison, but now the only way forward is through a series of strange portals. Can you manage to avoid being caught again?


EDIT: For anybody having fatal crashes, there seems to be random problems with the default Processing sound library and Windows. Will update the package using a different library which should solve the problem. Sorry for the inconvenience caused.

EDIT EDIT: If you gets stuck in an endless death loop, just press the R button.

103416.name: Dog Stacker
103416.body:
​My entry for Ludum dare 42, based around the theme of 'Running out of Space'.
The objective is simple, but hard to achieve; catch and stack the physics-enabled dogs up to the big dog at the top of the screen, without dropping dogs.
Dropping dogs causes your paddle to shorten, making it more likely you'll fail.

![screenie.PNG](///raw/71b/81/z/166cf.png)

PROTIP: I built this to work at 900 height x 600 width (no idea why) so you'll have to manually fiddle around with the resolution by dragging the window to see it at it's 'intended display size'. (There's a counter above the big dog's head that'll be visible when you strech the window out.)
#darkSoulsOfDogGames?

103444.name: (Running) Flying out of space
103444.body:
Controls for first version:
Shoot: Left Shift
Move: Space

Gameplay:

Go to the big spaceship to collect points that you need to use to open gates or shoot.

I've got sound effects from:
Soundbible.com
OpenGameArt.org
zapsplat.com
audiojungle.com

103453.name: Abstract City Builder
103453.body:
This is a puzzle game where you have to build a city to make as much money as possible, if you make a loss you lose or until you run out of land.  This shows how it is required to still make money from much less space because we are running out of space in our cities.

![FirstScreenshot.png](///raw/913/2/z/15ed4.png)

103460.name: Parking Spaces
103460.body:
I was on holiday for Ludum Dare 42 so I wasn't able to dedicate much time this time around but this is what I came up with in about 8 hours.

## Instructions
* You control car with red outline.
* Use A/D or Left/Right Arrows to steer.
* Use W or Up Arrow to "commit" to a parking space (you can no longer control that car)
* Don't let the car crash into one another or into a barricade.

Hints: Car will pick suitable space itself (front / back row) but make sure that the car in front intends to park longer than the one behind. The timer on the car states how long it will park. Make sure to allow cars with trailer/caravan and lorries to occupy two spaces or they will crash!

What's your highscore??

## Play Now
You can play WebGL version in browser here: https://imphenzia.itch.io/parking-spaces

## Screenshots
![ParkingSpacesScreenshot.png](///raw/d02/z/1685f.png)
 

![ParkingSpacesScreenshot2.png](///raw/d02/z/16863.png)

## Video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cvrs-i2zIX0

103472.name: Running in the space
103472.body:
This is our first game and our first Ludum dare please don't kill us. this game is an endless run genre. OK, this is all please play all (2 min.)game.
![screen1.png](///raw/d24/91/z/17734.png)
![screen2.png](///raw/d24/91/z/17737.png)

103476.name: Move it!
103476.body:
Shout "left" or "right" to move your character from falling lava! Watch out -- if the entire floor becomes lava, its game over!

https://youtu.be/Zlr3yYGh99U

Note: test your mic before playing.

Made during the AT&T Entertainment Hackathon, NY Aug 10-11, 2018

103477.name: Get Comfortable
103477.body:
This is a 3-minute journey through the struggle of bed, poor temperature control, and relationships. Navigate the bed, keeping warm or keeping cool, while your partner slowly makes their way onto your side of the bed. Can you make it to morning without heat stroke or hypothermia? 

![Capture4.PNG](///raw/425/d/z/1647a.png)

## Controls

Only Keyboard/Mouse for now. To heat up, stay under the covers. To cool down, get out of the covers. The more of your body is out of the covers, the cooler you'll get, and the more of you is under the covers, the warmer you'll get. Try not to die!

![get-comfortable.gif](///raw/425/d/z/17eb7.gif)

## Background

This is my first entry into Ludum Dare! I wanted to see if I could make a game in less time than I'd spend on a compo, and I think it was pretty successful :) I only put about 12 hours into this, and I'm pretty happy with the results. I worked mostly solo, but my lovely girlfriend helped with some design chat and a few of the assets. 

Software used: Godot 3.0, Gimp, Inkscape, Linux Multimedia Studio, Audacity

Assets: Kenney saved me from having to care about assets. The bodies and icons are all Kenney. Music was 10 minutes in LMMS. 

## Known Issues

* Web, Mac: It seems there's some out of bounds errors occurring on web mac builds. I've attempted to put up an OSX port, but I have no way of testing. Feedback on the Mac build *hugely* appreciated.

## Changelog:

* Chrome Particles: It looks like there's an active [issue on Git](https://github.com/godotengine/godot/issues/16281) regarding 2D particles in Godot and Chrome. The Windows build (available on Itch) will keep the original particles, but the web version will sadly be missing some zZZZs. 
* Mac Port: Added a mac port, but can't properly test it out. Seeking feedback!

103482.name: Skeleport
103482.body:
[![skeleport_cover.png](///raw/42/z/17c88.png)](https://tom.shea.at/ld42/)

Escape the Sages of Kitr by making use of the Skeleport! Defend against waves of enemies and bullets in a constantly shrinking area.

Use WASD / Arrow keys to move, Left click, Space and Q for your various abilities. If a controller is detected, it'll use that instead -- left and right trigger + left bumper and the two sticks.

Music and writing by @bryGPO, programming and design by @thristhart.

Uses these assets from itch.io:
- https://ansimuz.itch.io/space-background
- https://finalbossblues.itch.io/time-fantasy-monsters
- https://finalbossblues.itch.io/fantasy-rpg-tileset-pack
- https://finalbossblues.itch.io/pixel-animations-and-effects
- https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-fantasy

103489.name: Node10
103489.body:
This was my first Ludum Dare, and I'm rather disappointed with the result. I was only available for around 24 hours, and on top of that, I got not one, but TWO Blue Screens of Death (switching to Ubuntu now :p). In essence, I had around 6-ish hours to make something, so I settled on a really simple procedurally-generated puzzler. The code isn't great, there's horrific sound design, and I would hesitate to even call the visuals sprites, but I had a great experience nevertheless!

Source code is available as a download from the itch.io link. 

How To Play

WASD to move between black nodes. Leaving a node will cause it to be destroyed.
 
Arrow Keys to fire a bullet.

Shooting or moving will cause your turn counter to increase by one.

Each turn, bullets will move one space forward, and enemies will move or shoot.

Enemy bullets turn black nodes white, and vice versa.

Destroy all enemies within 42 moves to win.

103496.name: PIM : Product Input Management
103496.body:
Project Input Manager!

Ensure the client's satisfaction by shipping high value products!

Combine multiple products into new ones of higher value!

Rules:
 * All products give positive score upon shipping.
 * GREEN products cause positive effects to the TIMER.
 * RED products cause negative effects to the TIMER.
 * Dropping a product ontop of another, may combine the two.
 * You lose when the TIMER runs out.
 
Controls:
 * WASD = Movement
 * SPACE = Interact with products

Game developed by:
 @ixuz
 @kobeb

103504.name: Moving
103504.body:
Puzzle Game(?)

103528.body:
You've been elected as a new Commander of the underground colony on another planet. Walls keep collapsing, food is scarce, oxygen quickly decreases and people keep demending more and more of you. How long will you survive before you make one fatal mistake?

LMB - Build selected building.
