111362.body: Throw ball and remove broken sectors of HDD by inserting

111366.name: Forklift Simulator
111366.body:
![FShiscore.png](///raw/6af/81/z/174f6.png)

The perfect representation of a warehouse nightmare!

The goal is simple: deliver boxes to the pads of the same colour and try to store all the extra boxes (the neutral ones).
You play as a forklift driver in a warehouse full of boxes.


Made By Crispin and Erik

All downloads are on itch.io

UPDATE:

-Increases speed of boxes by score

-Player moves faster

-Colours are more clear

-Instructions are more obvious

111377.name: Scale Escape
111377.body:
Your goal is to escape from an ever-shrinking room.
Use your power to Grow and Shrink to push the walls back, find hidden keys and escape the room!
![Screenshot2.png](///raw/737/2/z/15d7e.png)

![Screenshot1.png](///raw/737/2/z/15d81.png)

![Screenshot3.png](///raw/737/2/z/15d83.png)

![Screenshot4.png](///raw/737/2/z/15d84.png)

111387.name: Overload
111387.body:
Overload is a game about serving baggage in the airport. Select the baggage and then select the particular traveler to serve the bag. If there is no space for the upcoming baggage on the belt, game over!!

![Tutorial.png](///raw/2b9/91/z/15f87.png)

![noplaceforbaggage.png](///raw/2b9/91/z/15f8a.png)


TOOLS I USED

Engine: Unity3D

Graphics: Adobe Photoshop & Illustrator

Music: https://bit.ly/2ny2KGZ

Twitter: https://twitter.com/jambavgames

111402.name: Crushing Depths
111402.body:
See how far into the depths you can sink! 

Press Left and Right to navigate the winding abyss. Press Space to push back the darkness that forever closes in around you. But if you push it back too far, you'll stop earning points. Refresh the page to restart.

Your score multiplier is determined by how far down you have sunk, and how much of the darkness overlaps your light radius. See if you can beat 100,000 points!

111407.name: Frantic Arrows
111407.body:
A simple game of trying to get rid of as many arrow blocks as possible, before it fills up your level and you run out of space.

Time-based simple survival game. Blocks will fall from above and fill up space within your level, players can destroy blocks by pressing on the right key when they change color at the bottom of the level.

The game will get significantly difficult over time with different shapes, and faster spawn rates.
There are only 3 difficulty levels, it gets ridiculous on 3.

All the simplistic blocks, UI, and assets are drawn in Photoshop by me.
Audio assets are royalty-free audio files found online at www.freesound.org

Resolution: 800 x 600
Game Type: Flash
Made in: Stencyl

Controls: 
> Directional Keys and "WASD" letter keys (in-game)
> Spacebar and "R" letter key for Menu UI Interactions


extra (trivia?) notes:
> There is an input delay of 0.2 seconds. I placed it in as a counter-balance when i realized piano-ing all the keys was possible to beat the entire game infinitely. 
> Physics was supposed to be place into the game, allowing blocks to fall around, making it more difficult to ascertain which is the right direction, making it a harder challenge. It was cancelled due to the Stencyl 2D physics engine being really bad at handling too many objects at one go, and was lagging my computer heavily (and possibly other players). 

![frantic.png](///raw/bed/e/z/177b6.png)

111415.name: Sticks and Stones
111415.body:
**Content warning: abusive language, suicide**

Join the adorable little bubble gum person on a walk through the fragile psyche. Control using W, A, S, D or arrow keys and see if you can help to keep this most intimate of all spaces safe and tidy.

![Screen1.png](///raw/db/z/179ba.png)

![Screen2.png](///raw/db/z/179bc.png)

![Screen3.png](///raw/db/z/179c2.png)

111416.name: Snake Reduction
111416.body:
It's snake, except the play area keeps getting smaller.

I'd like to have made something more original and better, but I stuck to the theme too hard and couldn't come up with anything feasible so I had to slap this together in around 8 and a half hours. That said, I did set myself the goal of finally submitting something here (no matter how bad) and at least I completed that (I've made attempts previous LD's, but this is my first submission!).

Next LD I probably won't stick to the theme as much if it prevents me from making something nicer!

One thing about the code, I created one of the classes (the input manager) outside of Ludum Dare. The rules say starting with existing base code is ok, but the submission checklist states the code must be written during the compo. I'm going to assume the rules are what counts.

111430.name: Space Saver
111430.body:
![Capture.PNG](///raw/1d5/a1/z/17403.png)


The parasites boxes are invading our universe, pillaging our planets for space. We are running out of space, if we don't kill them off at this one, we will go extinct. Your mission is to hold them off until reinforcement comes. Shoot Away, Space Safer!



Controls: 

W,A,S,D = Movements

Space / Mouse 1 = Fire

LShift = Increase Fire Strength

LCtrl = Decrease Fire Strength

Mouse Scroll = Turn Turret


This game is greatly inspired by Brackeys, Tim Ruswick, and the GDU Community

Link to Source Codes: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1nNS5bGq2mdb4g2cjW25cR6dOHNJ3b7N_

111432.name: The Not Very Golden Age of Piracy
111432.body:
![screenshot_2018-08-13_12-30-14.png](///raw/b09/z/17286.png)

I was deep in my cups when the mutiny began. Even still, I'd split the pate of two with my cutlass before they'd torn it, dripping, from my hands and thrown me in the hold. A week I'd been left down there, with naught but the rats to stay my loneliness, and starvation. 

It was there amid the rancid bilge I had my notion - A dread crew incapable of mutiny - of treachery - of anything beyond slaking their insatiable lust for blood! So, with hope renewed, I made good my escape… And now, with the infernal wailing of my new shipmates filling the sails, we embark to find our fortune, and may terror fill any that cross our bow.

![GoldenAgeSmall2.gif](///raw/7e4/z/1770c.gif)

## How to Play :video_game:

- Click to select your babies and click again to move them around your ship!
- Load the cannons with cannonballs!
- Take aim at the enemy ship and let loose!

### Tips

- Maximise the coverage of your hits to sink the enemy quickly!
- Make repairs in between rounds!
- Always be making repairs!

### Controls

- Just mouse and click!

## Credits :love_letter:

* **Jonathan Murphy**  ([nuclearfriend](https://twitter.com/nuclearfriend)) - Code
* **Louis Meyer** ([louisdmeyer](https://twitter.com/louisdmeyer)) - Music
* **Adrian Vaughan** ([YeOldShrimpEyes](https://twitter.com/YeOldShrimpEyes)) - Writing/Voice/SFX
* **Kyle Olsen** ([KyleOlsonmabob](https://twitter.com/KyleOlsonmabob)) - Art
* **Angelo Di Rosa** ([_t3nshi](https://twitter.com/_t3nshi)) - Art
* **Ben Weatherall** ([SunraHeadgear](https://twitter.com/SunraHeadgear))  - Music + Art
* **Dave Lloyd** ([duzzondrums](https://twitter.com/duzzondrums)) - SFX

![screenshot_2018-08-13_03-22-40.png](///raw/b09/z/1728e.png)

111434.name: Doogo needs space
111434.body:
Doggo's space is getting dirtier and people are settling down to scare him away.
Claim back your parc with the help and love of the citizen.

![2018-08-12 13_54_48-Window.jpg](///raw/ad2/1/z/15e0c.jpg)

Controls, thegame is designed for two players but can be played alone too:
Use the gamepad to move the dog. (or WASD/ZQSD keys if only one player)
Avoid walking on the dirty tiles, it slows you down.

Citizen gives you love when you passes by, the second player can use the mouse to collect the hearts (mouse over).
When you have 10 hearts, the dog can get closer to dirty tiles and bark to clean the tiles in the range (use the  button A on the gamepad if two players, Space bar if only one player).

Hobbos will toss junk at you. If hit, you'll loose some love.


You win when you manage to clean all the tiles. You lose if all the space is lost to the garbage.


![2018-08-12 13_55_47-Window.jpg](///raw/ad2/1/z/15e0d.jpg)

111436.name: LD42 - Untitled Defense Game
111436.body:
A little game I made for LD42.

I'm... not proud of this one, but I just had to make something this time. Don't have the energy to polish.


WASD to move around. Left mouse button to shoot. E to buy/upgrade turrets.

Heal damaged structures by standing next to them.

Try to stay on the platforms for as long as possible.



Edit: Reuploaded executables. I exported it using Godot Classic, so mono shouldn't be an issue anymore.

111442.body:
Avoid Black Holes & Control your Shape.

111463.name: PistonBreak
111463.body:
### About

You play a role of a person who has a tendency to appear in rooms with piston walls that want to crush you. :smile: 

The goal of the character is to get to the exit, which is at the top of the room. This exit is marked with "EXIT".

- Arrows or WASD for movement.
- R to restart the room.
- Escape is used to pause.

### How To Play

- Get to the top
- Avoid pistons that crush you

111514.body:
In Mars Initiative, you're in charge of a newly established Mars outpost.

111528.name: Cubic Cat Chaos !
111528.body:
Game entry for LD 42 : Running out of space.Made using MMF2.5, FL studio and sfxr. I missed the previous event, feels good to come back.

I made this game in 5 non-stop hours.Damn.To be honest,I didn't test this game very thoroughly...I hope there's no glitches...
If there IS,please let me know.

Including cute character and several game modes!

How 2 play:
Arrow key to move, Z to shoot bullet.Waiting for the power gauge to fill will allow you to shoot a powerful charge shot!

Gimmick:
When the enemy shoots the black bullet, it will turn the tile black.If you step on the black tile, your moving speed will be lowered.Dodging enemie's bullets is very difficult in this situation.However, once you defeat an enemy, the explosion caused by its death will turn the blackened tile back to white again.
You are running out of space!
Tips:The normal enemy will always run towards you after hitting the wall.You can try the manipulate their movement by using this property!

Hard mode:
Pretty much the same as the normal mode, but once you stepped on the black tile, you'll also suffer from constant HP loss...making it VERY difficult.

Pacifist mode:
You can't attack, the enemy won't respawn...just survive as long as you can.

God mode:
Infinite charge shot, black tile barely slows you down...the boss might be stronger, but it's not a problem in this mode.You also have 5 times the HP.
However, there's no score in this mode. This is what you get for playing the CAT GOD.

![sc1.PNG](///raw/1c5/9/z/15e72.png)

![sc2.png](///raw/1c5/9/z/15e74.png)

I also includes the soundtrack for this game in the file!And if you like those songs, be sure to check out my Youtube channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiQ4F7WZ5-soYvvgrXEyd1Q

I mainly made Vocaloid English songs. Subscribe if you liked them!

111535.name: No Vacancy
111535.body:
No Vacancy is a game about a hotel manager who is constantly overbooked. In order to free some rooms, she must dispose of some of the guests. Keep going as long as you can before you get caught.

![novac1.png](///raw/d74/21/z/171b0.png)

## Controls

- WASD or arrow keys to move
- Mouse click or J key to interact
- Mouse move to rotate camera

![novac2.png](///raw/d74/21/z/171b8.png)

Any feedback is appreciated. Thank you for trying out our game!

![novac3.png](///raw/d74/21/z/171bc.png)

111546.name: Platform (LD42)
111546.body:
Made in about eight hours because I had a wedding to go to this weekend.  This is a really garbage game but I wanted  to participate to keep the streak alive.

You are an astronaut in charge of protecting a platform from meteors.  Move left and right and jump to bat the meteors away, if you fall off the platform it's curtains.

The music was made with [Black Hole](https://mynoise.net/NoiseMachines/intergalacticSoundscapeGenerator.php).

The art was made with [Aseprite](https://aseprite.org/).

111552.name: Sweatin' Spinnin' Spacin'
111552.body:
Keeping running. Keep jumping. Exercise, sweat it out. Runnin' outta spacin'

**Control**
1. Run - click and hold mouse on planet, move cursor in circles to make player run.
2. Jump - release mouse.
3. Direction - direction of jump is dependent on where the player leaps off the planet.

**Objective**

Running out of space. Yes it is that literal.

![jumpsmall.gif](///raw/e63/e/z/179f8.gif)

>p.s. sfx generate from bfxr, bgm loop from http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Oorutaichi/

111568.name: A Race To Save Space
111568.body:
Hi. This game is about a careless agent who has to prevent a bomb from going off by downloading a special app. But there is no more space on the phone to download it. It is up to you(the agent) to delete some app and make space, but be careful some apps might be viruses.

small dev note: I know the UI on certain phones due to aspect ratio is messed up. I have included the Unity Project, feel free to help.


I hope you guys enjoy!



![s1.PNG](///raw/dc3/b1/z/16417.png)![s2.PNG](///raw/dc3/b1/z/16413.png)![s3.PNG](///raw/dc3/b1/z/16414.png)

111582.name: Nom
111582.body:
"Nom" is a game about managing how full you are with eating amazing sushi!

You have 3 minutes to eat as much sushi as you can, but can only manage 3 in your tummy at a time. Good luck getting the high score!

I created this in essentially 1 day, as my schedule didn't allow for much more LD jam time.

Thank you for checking it out!

![Screen Shot 2018-08-12 at 5.44.47 PM.png](///raw/532/z/168a1.png)

111589.name: Sharp Moss
111589.body: The moss is acting strange latelly and the legends says a flower lost in the woods can revert this.![Sem título.png](///raw/5d7/31/z/15ed6.png)![dsd.png](///raw/5d7/31/z/15ed8.png)

111600.name: Dice Builder
111600.body:
# :game_die: Dice Builder
Gather dices as many as the spots! Score up as much as you can!

## :video_game: Rules
1. If the dices are gathered exactly as many as the spots, they will be removed and you get score.
2. Placing dice onto another will add their spots.
3. If the spots exceed 12, the dice will become a boulder.
4. You cannot move across the boulder.
5. If you stuck among the boulders (or run out of space :smirk:), the game ends.

## :keyboard: Control
* W/A/S/D: Move dices
* Q/R: Rotate dices counter-/clockwise.
* R: Flip dices upside down.
* F: Mirror dices.
* Spacebar, Return: Place dices.
* Esc: Exit the game.

## :camera: Screenshots
See more screenshots on [itch.io page](https://lsk21kr.itch.io/dice-builder)!
![Dice Builder screenshots.png](///raw/ee3/b1/z/15fac.png)

111605.name: Urban Planner
111605.body:
![picture.png](///raw/95c/8/z/1600d.png)

Hi everyone. In this game your goal is to manage a city, and keep everyone as happy as possible, whilst housing enough people.

Destroy the wilderness as you go to prevent you from running our of space whilst you place houses for you population. You also have to balance various groups' opinions lest they sack you, or even worse, assassinate you.

There is no end condition yet, but you lose the game if you get under -1000 environmentalist opinion, -100 gang opinion, -200 socialist opinion, or over 100 homelessness. You are also meant to keep homelessness as low as possible.




I will upload a post-version later fixing these things :).

111607.name: Field of Bodies
111607.body:
Hello there here is my entry, this is the first time I try to use Java to create a game on Ludum Dare (Usually I use Unity or Haxe) but well I tried and here is the result:

![Thumb.PNG](///raw/98c/1/z/15f05.png)


Field of bodies is a Zombie Survival game where the most dangerous thing is running out of space due to dead bodies.

![screenCapture.png](///raw/98c/1/z/15f01.png)

Cool Features:
- Upgrade Weapons.
- Survivors with different AIs.
- Shoot at zombies.
- Find new weapons!

![Explanation.PNG](///raw/98c/1/z/15f03.png)

Warning: For an optimal experience you need a mouse to play this game.
![thumbnail.png](///raw/98c/1/z/15f06.png)

I hope you have fun killing some zombs! :)

111612.name: Sirkulphage
111612.body:
Sirkulphage is a simple mouse-based score attack game in which you control a little sirkul in a dangerous microscopic soup. Eat smaller sirkuls, grow, and build your score. If you like dodging, collecting and making numbers go big, maybe you're a sirkul.

![sirkulphage_screen2.jpg](///raw/458/a1/z/1600b.jpg)

This is my first Ludum Dare, but you can see other work on the Aetheric Games itch.io page. Sirkulphage is more "gamey" than the usual Aetheric output!

All work by me, except for fonts. 3rd party sounds were used as starting points, and all were edited and combined as a derivative work. All 3rd party stuff is detailed in the read me file. The code is built on a basic code base (input, movement and collisions) created earlier in 2018, plus Monogame.

111627.name: Grimlock (NOT GRIMROCK)
111627.body:
I apologize, but my English is not so good, so I use translate.google to write this description.
A few weeks before I found out when the ludum would be held I came up with the idea of ​​one game. And how I was surprised that it fits the topic of the ludum (so this game is more a test of my skills than a game specifically for the competition).
And so finally about the game. This is a dungeon keeper with puzzle elements (because I do not write code well), you need to destroy all opponents playing for one of the characters.
ATTENTION SPOILER
only 3 opponents.
CONTROL
UpArrow - 1-move forward
Left and Right Arrow - turn +-90 degrees
Space - Attack
P.S. assets taken from the free source in Internet, code - my work(bad code) and it's my first solo project=)

111644.name: Climate Chaos
111644.body:
A Simple game where space is running out and you have to make as many crops as possible. 

the controls are simple: 
W/A/S/D movement
V plant crop 
C create aquifier rasing the ground water levels on the adjacent tiles
X create a drain that will drain water from the adjacent tiles
Z creates a heater heating the adjacent tiles 

crops can't grow where there is too little water and too much water will destroy crops

Brown tiles = no water


Everything has a score 

Crop  -1 +2 score for crops that suvive an aditional -1 if they die 

aquifier/drain/heater -25

Sprites by DawnBringer over at open game art

111658.name: WWTD ( World Worst Tower Defence )
111658.body:
Had a lot of fun making this game even though the getting the theme to work on the game didn't go as well as i'd hoped. I learnt alot making the game especially that balancing games is not easy! May work on it for a few more days to improve the balance! I hope you enjoy playing as much as I enjoyed making it!

Instructions:
Each wave the buildable spots is reduced, if you have a turret on one of those spots you will be able to move it to an open spot for free.
Choose a turret to place and place it on one of the marked circles.
You can upgrade, move and sell individual turrets by pressing on them.
Total waves is 20.


Credits:
kenney.nl - All the sprites.

111670.name: Running Cosmonaut Simulator
111670.body:
This is my compo entry for LD42! I didn't have that much time this jam because of work, but hey, I made something!

You are a cosmonaut who is trying to "Run Out Of Space". Avoid the planets to try to reach the end of the universe (It's an endless game).

W and S for Up and Down Movement!

Birdman Font Used: https://www.dafont.com/birdman.font

Made With:
Unity
C#
Photoshop
Ableton Live 9
Audacity


![SS.png](///raw/034/z/15f76.png)

111673.name: GLASS HOUSE
111673.body:
# GLASS HOUSE
**(itch.io) [Grow flowers, earn enough money, then tend to your garden.](https://akirassasin.itch.io/glass-house)**

An entry for LD42 and AGBIC2018, though I missed the theme by quite a bit.

# GAMEPLAY

You need to collect enough money before the time ends, or your garden will be shut down!

Bring out your catalogue and start planting seeds! When they bloom into flowers, people will come to buy them. 

You can also harvest them to collect more seeds! The types of petal you use to make the seed will determine the outcome, so if you want a specific type, you should not mix.

# TOOLS USED
- [Unity](https://unity3d.com)
- [TextMesh Pro](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/84126)
- [Odin Rounded Light](https://www.1001fonts.com/odin-rounded-font.html)

# SOURCE
The source​ can be found at the bottom of the [game page](https://akirassasin.itch.io/glass-house).

111688.name: Memspace
111688.body:
![portada.png](///raw/dc6/2/z/17d48.png)

# MEMSPACE 

Here is my entry for Ludum Dare 42 with theme Running out of space. 

In your computer there is a virus filling it up with files and you have to delete all of them before the time is up or you delete all the files.
 
For delete a file, you need to click on it and enter the specified letters bewteen the "" symbols. 

There is no need to click in the input text to type in it!

![s1.png](///raw/dc6/2/z/17d47.png)

Hope you enjoy it !!

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Sound effects obtained from https://freesound.org/

Font obtained from http://www.fontspace.com/

[@azaharails](https://twitter.com/azaharails)

111702.name: Dungeon of Greed
111702.body:
![ludum42title.png](///raw/86a/z/16d11.png)

111742.name: SANDSTORM
111742.body:
## Objective
Go to the Safe Zone as quickly as possible to escape the sandtorm.  
Race the storm, avoid obstacles, move from location to location to regain your health and reach the safe zone.  
All timers indicated are the time left before the sandstorm devours you.

## Controls
Move - Left Stick / A-D (or Q-D)  
Throttle - Right Trigger / W (or Z)  
Brake - Left Trigger / S

We hope you enjoy! :)

My first ludumdare game. Made to LudumDare 42. its a wizard that is useless and kill a meme god just to dont scary na person. i know. i know. its idiotic my idea. I make this game on gms, thge engine that i Not program once 5 months ago.
its a short game. but made with the worst humor ever.

111761.name: Climate Change Simulator 2018 Chinese Hoax Edition
111761.body:
Climate change is progressing and destroying planet earth. One day, nature had enough and decided to get rid of this pest called humanity. More and more nature disasters take place and decimate the human population. As many cities are not habitable anymore the people are running out of living space.

You probably thought you will be helping the humans, but you are wrong! You play as nature and your goal is to get rid of every last human being. To do this you have a large tool set of nature disasters at your disposal. Will you send a meteor, a tsunami or even a bear?

![promo003.png](///raw/11a/z/16119.png)

## How to play
In each turn you draw a card from the pile. You then have to perform the action displayed on the card. Most of the cards are disaster cards. With these you can choose a city, or for some also a road, where the disaster will take place. There is also a city and a road card. The first will establish a new city and grant humanity some more space to hide from you. Although you can not prevent the creation of the city you can choose where it is built. After drawing the road card you have to build a new road between two cities. To do this, click on the first city and then on the second city. After the action was performed you may draw a new card.

If you don't want to play a card right away you may save at most one. To do this you can click on the card to the left. You can not do this if there is already a card there. To use it later you click the card *before* you draw a card from the pile.

![promo001.png](///raw/11a/z/16122.png)

Each city has an associated attractiveness which is influenced by many factors including population, number of connected roads, age and occurred disasters. People will move from cities with low attractiveness to directly connected cities with high attractiveness. The rate at which they move depends on the difference in attractiveness. The attractiveness is displayed with the hearts above the city. The number below the hearts is the population of the city.

A nature disaster will lower a cities attractiveness and thereby might drive people to neighboring cities. It will also kill part of the population. Some disasters kill a certain percentage of the population while others kill a fixed number, or a combination of both. A few disasters can be applied to roads and will destroy the road. The following table shows the effects of the different disasters.

| Disaster     | Absolute | Relative | Attractiveness | Road? |
| ------------ | -------- | -------- | -------------- | ----- |
| Heat Wave    | 5%       | 20 - 30  | 0.1            | No    |
| Thunderstorm | 5%       | -        | 0.2            | No    |
| Earthquake   | 10%      | -        | 0.8            | Yes   |
| Forest Fire  | 40%      | -        | 0.8            | No    |
| Bear Attack  | 50%      | 50 - 200 | 1.2            | No    |
| Plague       | 70%      | -        | 1.7            | No    |
| Meteor       | -        | 50 - 100 | 2.0            | Yes   |
| Tsunami      | -        | 20 - 30  | 2.0            | Yes   |

If the same disaster happens several times in the same city it will boost the effects of the disaster. For this only the last three disasters are taken into account. They are displayed under each city.

You win as soon as the global population reaches zero.

![promo004.png](///raw/11a/z/1611e.png)

## Controls
You can play the game without a keyboard. For some actions there are keyboard shortcuts:

 - Move map: W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys
 - Next card: Space or Enter
 - Save card: Q

If you wish to turn off the music you can click the button in the top right corner.

## Credits
Design, Code, Audio by Matteo Signer and Benjamin Schmid. Art by Patricia Schmid. Created in [Godot](https://godotengine.org/).

**HTML5 does probably not work correctly, your browser needs to support both WebAssembly and WebGL 2.0**

111801.name: Manspreader
111801.body:
![BetterManspreadImage.png](///raw/7bc/c/z/16433.png)

## MANSPREADER
One thing for certain is that manspreader's are always running out of space. Help this jolly young man spread his way to victory.


## HOW TO PLAY

* Right click when a human is inside of the dotted box by the right foot.

111822.name: Poseidon's Trident
111822.body:
Someone stole Poseidon's trident & you want to return it to his temple. Unfortunately it's one of those temples that doesn't really want any visitors at all (even if you do have good intentions) & will start to flood if you take a wrong step.

Try to get to the door without flooding the temple in this very short Bitsy game.

Use the arrow keys to move, & to move the dialogue on.

![screen capture.png](///raw/fa2/3/z/17d25.png)

111827.name: Energizer
111827.body:
# Energizer - the Last Survivor
## Intro
It's final showdown. And none of you have any ammunition left. There is a solution though. All you have to do is convert the floor you are standing on and power up your old trusty laser. Now you are unstoppable, unless you don't anywhere to stand on. **There can only be one!**

## Some screenshoots
### Intro
![cover.png](///raw/2d4/b1/z/17f72.png)

### Join the game
![ssintro.png](///raw/2d4/b1/z/17f78.png)

### Mexican standoff?
![ss1.png](///raw/2d4/b1/z/17f7a.png)

### Get hit
![ss2.png](///raw/2d4/b1/z/17f7d.png)

### One down already
![ss4.png](///raw/2d4/b1/z/17f80.png)

## Team
* Šarūnas Čiočys - Programming.
* Kristina Kuosaitė - Art, visual feel.
* Mindaugas Butkus - Programming, ideas.
* Justas Tomkus - Programming, ideas, gameplay.

## Instructions for players
Get a friend and at least one controller. Or even better - 3 friends and a controller for all of you and enjoy the **chaos** and **survive**.

## Regarding links
For windows users, if you don't know which one to get, x86 build, it's guaranteed to work; Unless you are using 5+ years old computer, better get generic (x86_64) build.

111828.name: GravDriftr
111828.body:
![preview.png](///raw/1d4/b1/z/16e02.png)

GravDriftr is a harrowing pursuit through space. Arcade style gameplay and visuals keeps you on your toes as you careen through space, comets, gravity wells, and black holes alike.

How long can you survive in space?!

...

This was a fun one to make! Probably the most fun I've had doing LD! Up until submission time panic. 

Feedback is always appreciated :smile: 

![title.png](///raw/1d4/b1/z/164b8.png)

111829.name: Chickens & Elves
111829.body:
Ever dreamed of owning a lot of chicken? What if you had too much of them?


In Chickens & Elves, colorful creatures help you extend your coop while the chicken family's growing. Assign elves to a portion of land according to their job (simple worker, woodman or miner) and build as quickly as you can! Don't let the sleepy elves take naps or the building won't be ready on time.


Manage the construction! Get a lot of chicken! Wake elves up in Chickens and Elves!

111831.name: CowSweep
111831.body:
![CoverArt.png](///raw/303/b1/z/16562.png)
You are a cow.

Boxes are falling on you.

Cow doesn't like boxes.

---


Controls


"WASD/Arrow keys" to move

"Space" to jump

Hold "Shift" to charge a dash

Release "Shift" to unleash your charge

111841.name: FIRE
111841.body: In FIRE, you must escape a burning Forrest by collecting three parts of a broken key.You must piece them together and escape through the front gate. WASD to move, touch keys to collect.

111845.name: Power Plant
111845.body:
![Cover Image.PNG](///raw/900/d/z/16f83.png)

Rules:
Your goal is to grow as many flowers as you can, and you play as the yellow/orange team.
At the start of the game there is a lot of space for everyone to grow their flowers on,
but after a bit of flower growing, the space will run out and you will have to fight other teams on the space that is left.
Flowers that are surrounded by other teams' flowers will die.
You can plant a new flower every 1.5 seconds.
The game is 60 seconds long and the winner is the team that had the most flowers at the end of the game.
The colorful bar on the top of the screen shows you the quantities of each team's flowers, and the timer above it shows you the seconds left until the game end.


Flower types:
![Flower Types 1.png](///raw/900/d/z/16f20.png)
Specializes in damage to other teams' flowers.

![Flower Types 2.png](///raw/900/d/z/16f26.png)
Can handle large quantities of other teams' flowers.

![Flower Types 3.png](///raw/900/d/z/16f27.png)
Makes his surrounding team mates capable of handling larger quantities of other teams' flowers.

Controls:
Left mouse button to plant flowers and click buttons,
Scroll wheel to switch between different types of flowers (The gray flower icon on the top left side of the window shows you the selected flower type.).

111846.name: DontNom!
111846.body:
Dontnom is a game where you don't want to let the black hole nom the planets! 

Drag the mouse to keep the planets in a steady orbit around the black hole!!

![LDJam42_2018-08-12_19-50-00.png](///raw/99c/a1/z/16299.png)

![LDJam42_2018-08-12_19-56-23.png](///raw/99c/a1/z/16292.png)

111847.name: Use Your Space Wisely
111847.body:
It's a hard life when you can only muster together four boxes to contain all your godly possessions.

Unfortunately you live that life, and you've got to move sharpish, so there's no time to pop to the neighbour's and ask to borrow a box!

You must pack as many items as possible into your four boxes, and get on outta there!

![screen1.png](///raw/d24/1/z/1613f.png)

Only problem is the only boxes you have are four boxes meant for vending machine bags of Galaxy Minstrel's the deliciously chocolately sweet with the delightfully crunchy shell... so they can't hold very much, and they aren't meant for very heavy contents, so see if you can actually pack everything!

![screen4.png](///raw/d24/1/z/16140.png)

Another game about packing? I suspect there'll be a few. I didn't have very long for this jam so I stuck with something straightforward. I had made something similar for LD37. Let me know if you have any problems! I actually wanted to make this when remembering a conversation very recently with my partner and his packing 'skills' so I had to make a game where you can overpack a box!

As a side note, annoyingly the font I was using did not have a £ sign, so the game talks of these mythical dollars.

Made in Game Maker Studio 1.4 utilising Paint, GIMP and audacity. I usually draw cute graphics, I've had a rough week so I went with a photo style similar to my LD30 entry which I enjoyed creating the assets for! (not usually the case).

111850.name: Running out of Memory Space
111850.body:
Running out of memory space is a puzzle game where every move is registered in a memory stick. The player has one or more memory sticks, each with a limited amount of space. When all the memory is used, no more moves can be made before undoing previous moves. Go through multiple levels with increasing difficulty, unlocking doors with keys and maybe unlocking two doors with the same key.

- Move with Arrow keys
- Undo moves with ctrl-z
- Change memory with 1, 2, 3
- Restart current level with R

![screen1.png](///raw/370/6/z/16124.png) 
![screen2.png](///raw/370/6/z/16126.png) 
![screen3.png](///raw/370/6/z/16127.png)

![level1.gif](///raw/370/6/z/17562.gif)

111853.name: Mother Bear
111853.body: Help a polar bear feed her cubs.

111857.name: Population Overflow
111857.body:
![screenshot.png](///raw/8e8/z/16149.png)

This is a game where you start out on an planet which is becoming rapidly overpopulated. You need to build up enough resources and build enough cities so that you can start moving people to other planets.

If at any point, any one of your planets has at least 1000 people, at least half of whom are homeless, the game will end. You need to build enough cities, and ferry enough people to other planets, that this doesn't happen.

Some Tips:
 - You can press the launch rocket button a second time to close the launch window.
 - You can hover over buildings to get more information about them including their current adjacency bonus.
 - Use the middle mouse button to move the camera.

Unfortunately I didn't have enough time to add sound (again) :(.

Good luck, and have fun!

(Source Code is available via the same link that you play the game from).

111863.name: Byte blasters
111863.body:
So this is the game I was working on, and it's pretty much done. This is my first time entering a Ludum Dare, so I don't know if I did everything right. It's even my first time finishing a game haha. It's supposed to be a mobile game, but I thought it'd be easier if I put it in an .exe format. It did get zoomed in because of that, and I needed to add black bars too.

The story is that you are part of a cleaning software, and you must delete all bytes you see, because that's what cleaning software does when you're running out of space.

Here are some screenshots of the game:

Title screen:
![MenuScreenshot.jpg](///raw/2f4/b1/z/162f5.jpg)

Gameplay screenshots:
![GameplayScreenshot1.jpg](///raw/2f4/b1/z/162f8.jpg)
![GameplayScreenshot2.jpg](///raw/2f4/b1/z/162fa.jpg)
![GameplayScreenshot3.jpg](///raw/2f4/b1/z/162fb.jpg)

Game over screen:
![GameplayScreenshot4.jpg](///raw/2f4/b1/z/162fc.jpg)

Gameplay:
https://youtu.be/1sJD6VYrmKc
The video does have more lag than normal, because I don't have a good laptop, so I highly recommend downloading the game for a better experience.

Hope you enjoy!!

P.S. I wasn't sure how to export it properly, so the first link is only the .exe file, and the second link is all the rest that came with the export. If the first link doesn't work, try downloading from the second link, but don't delete the first .exe file, since that's the only .exe file there. Hope you understand!!

111866.name: Space Transporter: Extra Cargo Edition
111866.body:
You are a space pilot working for transport company and your goal is to reach space station to sell all valuables picked up along the way.

Game includes guide page with more technical gameplay details.

Warning, on newer firefox versions some sounds do not play

You can pause the game by hitting Esc.

As per COMPO rules, everything was made by me within 48 hours.

Programs used:
- Cloud9 web IDE
- GIMP
- Audacity
- Various sound and music generating software

111868.name: Elevator Crush
111868.body:
This is my second time but I only had 24 hours to make a game.![Picture1.png](///raw/6a8/8/z/16161.png)![picture2.png](///raw/6a8/8/z/16163.png)

You're trapped inside an elevator.
Try to get as high as possible 
without being crushed by the two walls.

111871.name: Alone in the Sea
111871.body:
You are alone in the sea. How much time can you survive ?

![screen.png](///raw/5f1/c/z/16170.png)

You are Alone and you need to survive in this sea. 
The goal is to stay alive as much time as possible.


Controls :

 - Q & D for moving
 - Space for jump
 - Left mouse for fire

111874.name: Out of Space in Space with Space
111874.body:
========= About the Game ========

In Out of SPACE in SPACE with SPACE, your goal is to deliver a package to the moon! In a rocket! But it is rush hour, so there is no space in space. Can you still make it to the moon?

![Screenshot3.png](///raw/b94/1/z/16caf.png)

=== ATTENTION ===

I created the game in only 4 hours, because I had no time this weekend. But I managed to participate at least, and in my opinion, the game is pretty complete for only 4 hours.


========= How To Play ==========

Press SPACE to control your rocket. It cannot be any more simple.

![Screenshot1.png](///raw/b94/1/z/16ca4.png)


======== Music and Sound Effects ========

If you do not like the music and / or the sound effects, press the Sound on/off button in the top right corner.


======== Feedback ========

If you have feedback or found a bug, please leave a comment here or on the itch.io page, or tweet me at @dievo.


======== Versions =======

Windows Versions are available via itch.io. Sourcecode is available as Dropbox Download.


======== Bugs =========

Resolution: If your game is cut off on the edges, please use a 16:9 resolution, for example 1920x1080. For best results, please use the download version, not the WebGL.


======== Development ========

The game was made in Unity. Graphics were created with Adobe Illustrator. Sound was created with BFXR and Bosca Ceoil. 


========= FUTURE ======

Next LD, I plan to do a full 48 hour compo again. Did not have the time this weekend unfortunately, so the game is very simple.


A Ludum Dare 42 Compo entry. The game was made by Thomas Diehl in 4 hours. If you like it (or don’t) please leave a comment https://www.dievolution.com

![Screenshot2.png](///raw/b94/1/z/16cb8.png)

111878.name: Craig's Video Game made for LudumDare 42 That isn't even SLIGHTLY like Dig Dug 2
111878.body:
On Friday I started playing around with the marching squares algorithm and made a Pico 8 implementation with some nice looking lands tiles. I said it would be nice if this was a video game and then someone pointed out that Ludum Dare was this weekend. So strictly speaking I allowed myself more than two days, but my development time on this hasn't been too intense. I'd put the amount of total dev time around around the 20 hour mark

And so, a video game was made! And it's nothing like Dig Dug 2, honest!

111879.name: Demotrash
111879.body:
![aaa.jpg](///raw/ea2/d/z/1620f.jpg)
You are a destructor of trash. Use expanding beam and explode together.
## How to play
- Click or Tap anywhere to shot a beam. Ammo is reloaded by time.
- Gameover if trash touches a player.
- Game clear if all trash explode. The number of top of screen shows remaining.

111891.name: Bubbleverse.io
111891.body: You're in a bubble that's shrinking fast! Find other players in bubbles and merge with them to keep your bubble from getting too small. And your whole universe is a bubble that's shrinking fast around you! Oh and also avoid the bad guys trying to pop you.![Screenshot 2018-08-12 14.39.28.png](///raw/d05/b1/z/1680d.png)

111892.name: Feed cats
111892.body:
New to everything.

Tools used.
Libgdx
IntelliJ IDEA
Gimp

111893.name: Polar Panic! At the Disco
111893.body:
![Screen Shot 2018-08-12 at 9.51.10 PM.png](///raw/649/1/z/17b2e.png)

![asdf.gif](///raw/649/1/z/17b2f.gif)

![asdf2.gif](///raw/649/1/z/17bb7.gif)

### Instructions

Just because the ice caps are melting doesn't mean you can't get down! See how many animals you can keep afloat with your wave creation powers.

- Click on the water to send a wave that will push around icebergs
- Icebergs combine when they hit each other with enough force
- Achieve higher ranks based on how many animals you had alive at once

### Credits

- FizzpowMike1: Code
- akaSurreal: Code
- Grayson Bartlett: Art
- Oort: Art
- Derek63: Sound
- zenza: Dance Model

111898.name: Rocket escape
111898.body:
This game was created for Ludum Dare Compo 42.


Welcome into space.
You just escaped from your planet in a rocket. 

Your planet is falling into a blackhole and you too. 
Space and dimensions are running out.

As you get aspired into the blackhole, 
space will start to change and you will go through dimensions. 

Will you be able to escape?


GameEngine: Unity 2018.1 Personal
Game Art : Inkscape, GIMP, Blender
Some planet textures are based on planet images found on the internet. 
Music : LMMS

Prefer the windows build.

111900.name: Pianobots
111900.body:
![cover_ld.png](///raw/e5d/1/z/17994.png)
**_Pianobots_** is a game about bots performing a concert on a one-octave piano together.
Their timing is perfect, but they are not in tune.

Can you make these bots perform in harmony without them clashing onto each other?
Will the audience approve?


Play with your mouse.
Turn on your sound.


--

Composition and Level design by YenTing Lo

Development and 2d Art by Ferran Bertomeu

--

111902.name: Party Person
111902.body:
![1.png](///raw/61b/8/z/16525.png)

![header.png](///raw/61b/8/z/16526.png)

You've decided to organize a **big party**! You've made sure a lot of people were invited... But how many exactly?

- Use the **arrow keys** or **wasd** to move.
- **'Z'** to do a task (marked with a blue arrow).
- **'C'** to get rid of someone (If you use it with an intruder, it won't use any of your "Get-Rid-Of-Someone" items).

Move through the people to complete simple tasks. Will you arrive in time for the next one?

Show your score in the comments!

(Source code in the same page as HTML5)

111915.name: Alchemist's Apprentice
111915.body:
![Capture.PNG](///raw/ebb/31/z/1666a.png)
It's your first day working as an alchemist's apprentice. 
How exciting! 
Your job is to carefully transfer the more desirable, higher quality potions from the chute to the shelf whilst discarding any lower quality potions into the trash.
You will need to place different vials strategically, being cautious as to not let any fall to the ground and shatter. 
With each potion vial you break, the alchemist's patience will wear thin.
Try not to get hurt and remember to have fun!

[Grab the vials by clicking and holding onto them with your LEFT MOUSE BUTTON]
[Release your grip on the vials by removing your appendage of choice from the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON]

meta.link-01-name: It's your first day working as an's apprentice.  alchemist

Our game features frustrating realism in a believable atmosphere. Dive into a mumbling crowd in an attempt to catch your train. If there is one thing you can't stand: it's Monday morning, 7:30 am.

Made by:

Felix Huber,
Matthias Baur,
Raphael Leiteritz

111941.name: A Bodge In Time
111941.body: After signing up to his first LD I only had 2 hours to do ... something. So this is not winning anything!![LD042.PNG](///raw/345/b1/z/16812.png)

111944.name: UnnamedGame
111944.body:
I have no idea of what's going on in this game and how it relies to theme.
But it looks nice.
Sometimes.

# Controls:
* WASD (or joystick axes 0 and 1)
* F (or *both* joystick buttons 0 and 2) - hold to add light

# IMPORTANT
Read [this](https://oldnpluslusteam.github.io/old-42-game/) note about recomended hardware.

# Running the game:

Java 5 or later is required to run the game.
If Java is installed properly then the game should run by just opening the jar file as usual executable file.
If it doesn't work then try to run the following command in the directory where the jar file lies:

```
java -jar UnnamedGame.jar
```

(where `UnnamedGame.jar` is name of the downloaded game jar file)

On Windows you can run the command by putting it's text into a file with `.bat` extension placed in the same directory as jar file and executing that bat file.

111959.name: A slow day at the office
111959.body:
![screenshot.png](///raw/455/b1/z/1631e.png)

Pick up a keyboard and do your best to stay alive.

__Controls:__

WASD - Movement

F - Pick up

LMB - Hit

111968.name: NGC 4889
111968.body:
You are a merchant on his way to complete a job transporting cargo. As you maneuver past a black hole that you pass by every day something terrible happens. You ship's engines lose power and you are succeed through. You come out through another black hole into a new galaxy. Your computer identifies it as NGC 4889. NGC 4889 is a galaxy with a black hole at the center. The intercom comes on with a crackle. A deep voice rattles through it as you turn your head towards the device. "Hello. I am Rúni Azra, the commander of the 4th Fleet of Chumor Empire. We have planned the destruction of this galaxy as to obtain the resources it's planets hold. We advise that you leave the system as soon as possible." And with that the intercom turns off. You hear them speak of these valuable resources and your greedy mind takes over. Collect as many resources from the various planets before the fleet "harvests" there resources and depart through the black hole.

Instructions

-Search as many planets as possible.

-Return to the black hole.

-The 4th Fleet will destroy planets at a steady rate.

-Don't be on a planet when it's being destroyed.



Controls

-Left click on a planet to move there.

-Click the "search" icon to search a planet for materials.

-Click the "return" icon on the black hole to escape.

111976.name: Maze Runner
111976.body:
![LDJAM42_SC01.png](///raw/e23/6/z/16315.png)

![LDJAM42_SC02.png](///raw/e23/6/z/16318.png)
_____________________________________________________

### ENTRY INFO

Hey there! This year I tried to do something experimental in ~10h.

As the theme is "Running out of space" my take was using the visual space. As you progress in the game, your vision of the game decreases.

Furthermore, I wanted to match gameplay & control.
You are a tetraplegic that has to escape from a maze, and you can only execute actions with your hand.
You are constantly remembering the path you made in the maze so you don't get lost.

[itch.io blocks the twitter link so [carlosvVk](https://twitter.com/carlosvVk)​ you can open it here.
_____________________________________________________

### CONTROLS

**Left click:** Go forward.

**Right click:** Go backward.

**Mouse scrollwheel:** Rotate.

**Middle click:** Blink.
_____________________________________________________

### TOOLS

- Unity C#

- Adobe Photoshop

- Audacity

- Ampermusic
_____________________________________________________

### CONTACT

- **Twitter:** [carlosvVk](https://twitter.com/carlosvVk)

- **Gmail:** carlosizquierdo.dev@gmail.com

111980.name: Æmoeba Æscape
111980.body:
You are an amoeba that has run out of space in its dish. Grow your way out of the lab.
![amoeba-escape.gif](///raw/b65/b1/z/162aa.gif)

Tested+working on Chrome 68.0.3440.84 (Official Build) (64-bit) on OSX.

111983.name: Mini Organizer 3000
111983.body:
![mini_organizer_1.gif](///raw/bd1/z/162b0.gif)

Probably not the most original of ideas, but hey, I'm glad I could actually finish it! :)

'Mini Organizer 3000' is a small puzzle game where you try to clean up in your storage area by pushing the colored blocks into their respective slots.
If any blocks fall into the pit you'll have to restart (press 'R') and try again!

There are 3 different kinds of blocks:
- The YELLOW and GRAY blocks each move 1 step when pushed.
- The BLUE blocks will slide until they hit something, or fall down into the dark pit below.
- The GREEN blocks will bump into other blocks and push them.



Controls:
- Use the mouse to move and left-click to push any adjacent blocks.
- Press 'R' to restart.
- Press 'Escape' to open the menu.

111987.name: Names are Hard
111987.body:
This is a simple non-scrolling platformer.   Collect all of the pickups to reveal the door to the next level.  

You have a time limit.  There is a leak and the water level is rising,  You can swim and hold your breath for a while, but you have to complete the level before you run out of breathing space. 

![LD_42_2.jpg](///raw/05/z/1733b.jpg)

Keys are WASD or Cursor Keys for movement.  Ctrl or space to jump. There is an introduction level and Two proper levels.  I would have liked to have more but level design require playthough which slowed things down qutie a bit.  

If you play on Chrome on an Android device you can go fullscreen and use the onscreen gamepad.  I haven't had a chance to test it on iOS or anything other than my own phone.

111994.name: Running out of Toaster
111994.body:
In the year of 20XX on Earth, the alien race known as the Cleitons has develop the superior technology to take over all the known planets in the Universe. However, when their resources start to become scarce, they decide to open a portal and explore a parallel dimension.

However, what the find is a world dominated by hostile kitchen utensils, and so the battle begins.![Selection_516.png](///raw/be9/9/z/162b4.png)![Selection_515.png](///raw/be9/9/z/162b6.png)

112009.name: Plenty Of Junk
112009.body:
Control a junkyard creature and survive as long as you can while finding food and avoiding the incinerator

In an experiment that involves lots of code and godot spring physycs I've accidentaly created an horrible monster. Luckily it won't be able to survive much ın the junkyard I've dumped it in
![food3.png](///raw/f79/31/z/17353.png)![food2.png](///raw/f79/31/z/17352.png)![food1.png](///raw/f79/31/z/17355.png)

112011.name: Gunning Out of Space
112011.body:
Shoot the endless enemies, a miss causes an obstacle to spawn, it will hurt you but not enemies. The longer you play the faster you run out of space. This was my first game jam and it was tons of fun, this was also my first ever 2D game. 
Controls:
A and D to move, space is to jump(You have a triple jump), click to shoot at cursor(Despite the gun not actually pointing there...)

meta.link-02-name: Play it on itch, must be in fullscreen

112019.name: Ooze Blues
112019.body: Avoid  Ooze and their deadly droppings as you tactically survive until you eventually run out of space.!

112020.name: THEY CAME FROM OUTER SPACE AND YOU'RE OUT OF SPACE!
112020.body:
What is this? Everything's all weird. 
A pulsing ring has appear around you and things are starting to float...
Wait... They're floating towards you! AND THEY'RE FAST!

Attempt to see how long you can survive.
Pickup items along the way to help you survive.
Avoid getting hit at all cost!


You need motion controllers to play this game.
I have only tested using HTC Vive so I cannot guarantee your experience on any other HMD.

Demo Video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mAGg4_JIBbA

p.s. Sound effects aren't my strong suit :3

112021.name: Jailbird's Flight
112021.body:
what happens when a flood warning comes and you get left behind? find out! you play as jailbird, a prisoner left on the island after a flood warning, collect the rescue items left behind to call the chopper and go home!

WASD to move, click on the interface, esc to pause.
I suck at making games, I couldn't even make music for this one, but hopefully it isn't the worst one.

112025.name: [ARK_DRIVE]
112025.body:
Oh no, cyber-god is drunk and about to erase the entire internet!

Save the coolest digital animals from extinction by storing them on your computer.

How many can you fit?

🐯🐢🐳🦖➡💾

> (Don't worry, all of the animals can easily be deleted again!)




![ark1.PNG](///raw/795/b1/z/16446.png)

![TRAIL.png](///raw/b57/8/z/17a18.png)

112036.name: Dragon Horde: Revenge of the Wizard King
112036.body:
![itch_banner.png](///raw/c23/2/z/17f77.png)

“Dragon Horde: Revenge of the Wizard King” is a game created for Ludum Dare 42 with the theme “running out of space”. DH:ROTWK is a 2-player competitive arcade game where a thicc Dragon and a gloopy Wizard King face off in a battle of ultimate strategy. 

Contrary to popular belief, “Revenge of the Wizard King” is not a sequel, but a reboot of the Dragon Horde franchise. Open-World Battle-Royale elements have been scrapped in order to accommodate the superior high-intensity spirit of Jezzball.

No one quite knows why the Magical Monarch wants revenge against the Dragon. Some say the Dragon re-did the interior design of the King’s castle without his knowledge, thus replacing the floor with crumbling hexagonal pillars and the walls with bottomless pits. Others speculate that the Dragon is jealous of the way the King has mastered flight with his hot-air balloon, whilst the winged dragon is too large to fly.  Whatever the reason, you can be sure that the deeply detailed lore of the Dragon Horde cinematic universe has a reasonable explanation for the King’s incredible magical ability to literally plop bombs.

![DH_screen.PNG](///raw/c23/2/z/17fb8.png)

CONTROLS: 

P1 is w,a,s,d,~,1,

P2 is arrowkeys, period, /

Players: 2

Compatible with Winnitron

Created by Matt Woelk, Mitchell Harder, Ben Bergman, Kyle Hall and Stephanie Chacon-Vega

No Audio

112037.name: Running out of Space
112037.body:
![LD42 Splash.jpg](///raw/03b/c/z/16d4f.jpg)

A simple 2D game about a satellite avoiding an increasing amount of space junk.

I did not have much time this weekend, hence the simple idea, but I wanted to take part anyway! I hope you enjoy!

112039.name: CLAUSTROPHOBOI
112039.body:
![cboi_01.png](///raw/509/91/z/16a6d.png)![cboi_02.png](///raw/509/91/z/16a75.png)![cboi_03.png](///raw/509/91/z/16a7b.png)![cboi_04.png](///raw/509/91/z/16a7e.png)![cboi_05.png](///raw/509/91/z/16a73.png)


A small game about a Boi that needs his personal space.

Arrows to move /
Space to Shoot / 
Esc to Quit

My first game ever for Ludum Dare, my first compo and my third game jam at all. So every feedback is appreciated :v: 

//Sounds & Music are unfortunately barely existent. I'm sorry, my dudes.// 
//Tools: Unity, Photoshop, 3DSMax, left, SFXR, Visual Studio//

112043.name: Hot News, Good News
112043.body:
![370a2f47efb9143f.png](///raw/9a5/b1/z/16d1a.png)

Hello and welcome to Hot News, Good News!
Your task is to create your own newspapers and send them into the edition.
You will have to create a newspaper by combining advertising blocks
and news blocks on the sheets of the newspaper.
Drag and drop blocks on the newspaper sheet using left mouse button and glue it using right mouse button.
![dragging__gluing.gif](///raw/9a5/b1/z/16afa.gif)
But be careful! You have limited time to build a newspaper.
![timer.gif](///raw/9a5/b1/z/16b09.gif)
And remember: readers don't like advertising blocks, but it will bring you profit for your newspaper edition. 
And lots of news blocks will bring you more readers.
Combine blocks wisely!
Earn money and followers.

Make the whole city read your newspaper.
That's all, hope you like it.

Music:
https://soundcloud.com/sshd0/its-always-good-news

112048.name: Memory.exe
112048.body:
Ludum Dare 42: Running out of space

My first project where I did everything - programming and art, but also music! I am not a musician, so I went for an extremely minimalist style, and I think it actually turned out pretty good!

This game is a deceptively simple metroidvania that is complex in its design. This entire game is one big puzzle, and I highly recommend you take notes. Can you clear the memory?

![memgif1.gif](///raw/56f/2/z/169f3.gif)
![memgif2.gif](///raw/56f/2/z/169fa.gif)
![memgif3.gif](///raw/56f/2/z/169fd.gif)

112063.name: Ludam Dare 42: Lava Escape
112063.body:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 42, with the theme "Running out of space".
In this game you are running and jumping away from the lava, that comes from below. If you touch the lava, you die immediately. There are also coins you can pick up on your way to the surface.

Unfortunately I could not get the HTML5 version to work with Chrome, and it has only been tested in Firefox.


Tools used:

Engine: Godot 3 https://godotengine.org/

Sprites: Aseprite https://www.aseprite.org/

Images: paint.net https://www.getpaint.net/

Sound effects: sfxr http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html

Music: Bosa Ceoil https://boscaceoil.net/

Screenshots: ShareX https://getsharex.com/

112067.name: Cave Dwellers
112067.body:
![LD42 - Cave Dwellers - Screenshot 1.png](///raw/208/2/z/1671e.png)

Cave Dwellers is a puzzle game in which you build villages for a subterranean civilisation. The underground caves in which these people live are small and cramped - as you expand their villages, you will quickly run out of space. So you must lay out the buildings carefully and efficiently in order to reach the desired population.

Controls and instructions are provided in-game.

112069.name: Tetris Hero
112069.body:
![TitleScreen.png](///raw/c97/9/z/163a0.png)
![Ingame.png](///raw/c97/9/z/163e2.png)

Please read full description on itch.io

112070.name: Tank Wars
112070.body:
*Need two controllers for multiplayer! (Cant be one keyboard and controller atm)

## Summary

A Shared Screen Multiplayer where you fight with your friends against different tanks on a destructible environment!

Choose a tank against a friend and together wreck havoc on the battlefield! Tiles hit by the tanks projectiles will be destroyed resulting in less room for the players to maneuver.

==========================================

## Controls


#### Keyboard:

WASD - Move

Space - Shoot

Shift - Dash

Arrow Keys - Move Cannon

==========================================

#### Xbox Controller:

Left Analog Stick - Move

A - Shoot

X - Dash

Trigger - Move Cannon

==========================================

UI
Red Bar - Health Bar
Orange Bar - Dash Cooldown

![battle1.PNG](///raw/a30/2/z/1652e.png)
![tank selection.PNG](///raw/a30/2/z/16537.png)
![Capture3.PNG](///raw/a30/2/z/1653c.png)
![Capture2.PNG](///raw/a30/2/z/1653a.png)

112073.name: Claustrophobia
112073.body: Claustrophobia is a small puzzle game. This was my first full entry into Ludum Dare and I feel I have learned a lot about how fast I am and what I can do in a set amount of time, I was more careful this time and chose a project I knew was going to be manageable and I hope to be riskier next time.

112077.name: Stone Splinter
112077.body:
Goal of the Game:

Move the character past all stone tiles to destroy them. Once all stone tiles has been destroyed the level has been cleared and you move on to the next one! Game includes 9 levels, with increasing difficulty!

Controls:
- Arrow Keys: Move Up, Down, Left and Right.
- Esc: Returns user to menu.

![CoverImage.png](///raw/323/41/z/16819.png)


Lastly:

Thank you for testing and feedback!
Hope you enjoy the game! :smile:
Sunblast.

112079.name: SMUSH'EMS
112079.body:
![screenshot2.png](///raw/065/4/z/16f2a.png)

SMUSH'EMS!
A little smush-based puzzle game for two.
YEP I DIDN'T MAKE A SINGLE-PLAYER SO YOU'RE GONNA NEED A FRIEND

Please grab a friend to play with, it's a turn-based multiplayer thing!
You're not gonna have much fun playing against yourself!
AI was out of scope I'm sorry!


Take turns dropping blocks onto the field in an attempt to smush the most Greebles. Choose to place between 1-3 blocks to put your oppononent in a position where they have to give up a Greeble!

Controls are mouse only, though you can press the spacebar to end your turn.

Was a lot of fun to make, hope y'all had a great LD!

112080.name: Sky Runner
112080.body:
​Sky Runner is an infinite-runner game created for Ludum Dare 42. The theme of LD42 is "Running out of space".

https://youtu.be/HEloh_wO1DM

How to play: 
It's simple. Press SPACE to jump. Avoid meteorites and collect bitcoin. The more bitcoin you have, the more difficulty increases.

This game was created using:
Unity
Aseprite for art
SFXR and Audacity for sound effects
Reaper for music
![screen01.png](///raw/62e/4/z/16a72.png)

![screen03.png](///raw/62e/4/z/16a74.png)

![Untitled.png](///raw/62e/4/z/16a76.png)

This game was created for the Compo, but I accidentally gitted my source code (and everything else) to the eternal abyss. Fortunately, I did manage to get a web build of the game up on itch before the deletion, so I am still able to submit for the Jam.

112084.name: Thinning The Herd
112084.body:
Human overpopulation is becoming a major problem, time for nature to thin out our numbers. Click any part of the world to call forth natural disasters and monstrous creatures to bring down the human population as it continues to go up. All art and audio is original. Artwork by Creaon96 (me), programming by GregWLyons, and audio by Muse en Lystrala.
![Sea Serpent Game Jam.jpg](///raw/3d5/b1/z/16fea.jpg)![Rugose Beast Game.jpg](///raw/3d5/b1/z/16feb.jpg)![Kraken Game Jam.jpg](///raw/3d5/b1/z/16fec.jpg)![Forest Guardian Game Jam.jpg](///raw/3d5/b1/z/16fee.jpg)![Thunderbird Game Jam.jpg](///raw/3d5/b1/z/16ff0.jpg)![Thunder Storm Game Jam.jpg](///raw/3d5/b1/z/16ff1.jpg)![Tornado Game Jam.jpg](///raw/3d5/b1/z/16ff2.jpg)![Tidal Wave Game Jam.jpg](///raw/3d5/b1/z/16ff3.jpg)![Volcanic Eruption Game Jam.jpg](///raw/3d5/b1/z/16ff5.jpg)![Wildfire Game Jam.jpg](///raw/3d5/b1/z/16ff6.jpg)

112086.name: Clash of Fighters
112086.body:
![title.png](///raw/e4e/z/1687b.png)

## Welcome to the Fleet, Cadet!

**_Are you ready to become an hero? Space Tactical Academy is wating for you!_**

In this training you will learn the basic dogfight maneuvers. You will pilot a _SF-12 Stab_ and you shall defeat all your enemies! Keep your ass safe and burst theirs.

And remember: avoid running out of space.

![Hyperspace.gif](///raw/e4e/z/16865.gif)

## CONTROLS

- **Move:** Drag and drop your fighters

- **Shoot:** Every fighter will shoot automatically at the end of the turn if there is an enemy at the front


## SF-12 STAB

Space-superiority fighter

- **Weapons:** 2 laser cannons
  - Range: 2
  - Power: 1

- **Engines:** 2 advanced proton impulsers
  - Movement: 3

- **Hull:** Titanium light armored
  - Resistance: 3 damage

- **Shields:** None

- **Additional tactical systems:** None


## TOOLS

- Unity 3D
  - Text Mesh Pro asset
  - DOTween asset
  - More Effective Coroutines FREE asset

- Visual Studio

- Adobe Photoshop

- Adobe Illustrator 

- Audacity

112087.name: Super Crate Hoarder
112087.body:
![16.gif](///raw/877/z/1775f.gif)
![10.gif](///raw/877/z/17761.gif)

Z - Jump
X - Shoot
R - Restart

* Collect crates to gain points!
* Enemies who fall through the bottom come back through the top and move faster!
* Each crate gives you a random weapon!
* Crates, once collected, stick around as items to platform around!

A clone of `Super Crate Box` with the addition you never dispose of your crates. That means each crate you pick up sticks around and becomes a platform.

TOOLS:
* [Monogame](http://www.monogame.net/) - Framework
* [Nez](https://prime31.github.io/Nez/) - Engine
* [BFXR](https://www.bfxr.net/) - SFX
* [BeepBox](https://www.beepbox.co) - Music (maybe)
* [PyxelEdit](https://pyxeledit.com/) - Pixel Art

LINKS: (they seem to be broken often)
* [Windows build](https://andrewnapierkowski.itch.io/super-crate-hoarder)
* [Source Code](https://gitlab.com/neipo13/ld42)

112089.name: Without a mark
112089.body:
Without mark is a memory game where you get packets that you need to store in your warehouse. The warehouse has a limited amount of space and every shelf can hold a limited amount of weight. Once a new packet comes you can see what it includes, but after placeing it to your warehouse you need to remeber what that packet include to sell it.  
**CONTROLS**  
-**E OR Right Click** - When there is a truck on stop you can send it back by pressing E. There is no penalty to sending the truck back.  
-**Left Click** - You can click objects to interact with them. Clicking a box will show its information and clicking on shelf will show how much .  
**Game rules**  
  You will start with 100$ and 1 box per delivery. But after each day the delivery will rise.  
You will pay fees every other day. The fee will start at 100$ and will rise each day.  
If you give a wrong packet to the buyer you will lose 100$  
The game ends when you will run out of money  
![ScreenShot.PNG](///raw/d9c/9/z/16594.png)  
**HOW TO PLAY**  
![Tutorial1.png](///raw/d9c/9/z/165b3.png)  
![Tutorial2.png](///raw/d9c/9/z/165b6.png)  
**Tools used**  
Engine: Unity 2018.2.2f1  
Sprites: Asprite  
Some sound effects: bfxr  
This game was made in 24 hours and i didn't have time to make music for it. I know there can be few bugs and im sorry about that. Hope you have fun!  
**CHANGE LOG**:  

- Fixed multiple bugs that broke the game.

112090.name: SQUASH KILL
112090.body:
You find yourself in an abanded warehouse that is slowly filling up with more and more boxes. Also, there are zombies walking around and the only way to kill them is by SQUASHING them.

Welcome to...
SQUASH KILL!

Controls
Move: arrow keys  OR  WASD
Restart: R key
Fullscreen: F key

"It's pretty simple game but I quite like it, I like squishing zombies" ~ Jupiter Hadley
